name: São Domingos Residences 1
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
São Domingos Residences 1 is a recently renovated apartment in the centre of Porto, 400 metres from Ribeira Square and 300 metres from Palacio da Bolsa. Among the facilities at this property are luggage storage space and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Clerigos Tower is 700 metres from the apartment and Oporto Coliseum is 1.2 km away.

The apartment is fitted with a cable flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ferreira Borges Market, Sao Bento Metro Station and Sao Bento Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from São Domingos Residences 1.

name: Village Aparthotel By BOA
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Set in Porto, less than 1 km from Oporto Coliseum and 600 metres from the centre, Village Aparthotel By BOA offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a garden. This recently renovated aparthotel is located less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and a 9-minute walk from Sao Bento Train Station. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

The aparthotel provides guests with a patio, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Continental and vegetarian breakfast options with fruits, juice and cheese are available every morning at the aparthotel. A minimarket is available at the aparthotel.

The aparthotel has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near Village Aparthotel By BOA include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Downtown PortoEdition
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 20m²
description:
Downtown PortoEdition provides accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The property is around 400 metres from Ribeira Square, 600 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and 600 metres from Sao Bento Train Station. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a toaster, a coffee machine, a a bath or shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. All units are fitted with a kettle and a private bathroom, while selected rooms have a balcony and some have inner courtyard views. At the apartment complex, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Downtown PortoEdition include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Pao de Acucar Hotel
description:
Located in Porto’s historic centre, 100 metres from Avenida dos Aliados and the Metro station, this hotel offers art déco-style interiors, a multilingual staff and a spacious terrace. The Douro River is 15 minutes’ walk away.

All rooms at Pão de Açúcar Hotel feature double-glazed windows, vintage furnishings and include a private bathroom. Every room has air conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar, and some rooms also feature a terrace.

Breakfast is served daily, guests can enjoy it in the breakfast room or on the terrace, which overlooks the historical Porto City Hall building. There are many restaurants and bars within a few minutes’ walk.

Guests can relax with a book borrowed from the hotel’s library, or visit the old toy and retro collection, with vintage bumper cars from the 70's. From Pão de Açúcar, you can enjoy a short walk to the Port Wine Cellars and taste some of the world-famous Port Wine. Sao Bento Railway Station is 500 metres away.

Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is a 15-minute drive away, and 30 minutes by metro. Car parking is available nearby for an additional fee.

name: HF Ipanema Park
description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, this 5-star hotel offers a rooftop bar with Porto and Douro River views. The HF Ipanema Park is 1 km from Serralves Museum and Garden.

The hotel provides a variety of rooms and suites, all with cable channels and Sport TV. A mini-bar, 24-hour room service and free WiFi are also featured in all air-conditioned rooms.

The hotel has six charging stations for electric cars, two of which are fast-charging (22 kVa), available for an additional fee. We do not accept reservations. For more information, please contact the reception desk upon arrival!

Guests can enjoy their meals at the Jardim d’Inverno Restaurant or have a snack at the Twin Trees snack bar. The seaside area of Foz do Douro, with its restaurants, bars and cafes, is a 5-minute drive.

After a session at the gym, guests can enjoy a relaxing massage in our spa for an additional fee. Babysitting services are available.

The Ribeira UNESCO World Heritage site is a 10-minute drive from the Ipanema Park, and Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is 12 km away.

name: YOTEL Porto
description:
Set in Porto, 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, YOTEL Porto offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Certain units at the property feature a balcony with a city view.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At YOTEL Porto all rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from YOTEL Porto.

name: Studios Baixa Downtown Porto
description_short: Private suite
description:
Located in Porto, a 2-minute walk from Paris Galleries Street, Studios Baixa Downtown Porto offers accommodation with free WiFi.

Each unit comes with a sofa bed, a modern and efficient air conditioning system, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with large shower. The "Suite" has not a kitchen but is provided with a microwave and small fridge, a dinning table with 2 chairs as well a coffee machine and an electric teapot. The "Studio" is provided with a well-fitted kitchenette.

Clérigos Tower is 300 meters from the apartment. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 18 km from the properties.

name: Dragon Studio
description:
Dragon Studio is set in the Paranhos district of Porto, 2.2 km from Sao Bento Train Station, 2.4 km from Music House and 2.5 km from Boavista Roundabout. The property is located 2.6 km from Oporto Coliseum, 2.9 km from Clerigos Tower and 3.1 km from FC Porto Museum. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sao Bento Metro Station is 2.1 km away.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is featured. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Ferreira Borges Market is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Campanha Train Station is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from Dragon Studio.

name: TRYP by Wyndham Porto Centro Hotel
description:
Situated in downtown Porto, this hotel is a 6-minute walk from shopping on Rua de Santa Catarina. It offers air-conditioned guestrooms with satellite TV. Private outdoor parking is available on site, along with a charging station for electrical vehicles.

Rooms at the Tryp Oporto Centro Hotel have parquet floors and modern wood furnishings. They come equipped with a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms feature an elliptic bicycle. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Guests of Hotel Tryp can benefit from the laundry and dry cleaning services. Staff at the 24-hour front desk assist with car hire and offer information on local attractions.

Hotel Tryp Oporto Centro is situated 550 metres from the Marques Subway Station, and is a 5-minute walk from several restaurants serving traditional Portuguese cuisine.

name: AC Hotel Porto by Marriott
description:
A 5-minute walk from Estadio do Dragão Metro Station, the modern AC Hotel Porto offers a fitness room, sauna and business centre. With a 24-hour front desk, it has free WiFi in public areas.

Decorated in contrasting colours, each bright and spacious room includes floor-to-ceiling curtains. They offer air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and minibar. The private bathrooms provide free toiletries.

The AC Hotel Porto is situated 4 km from the Campanhã Train Station, which offers connections to Lisbon and Vigo in Galicia, Spain. Porto’s Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 12 km away.

name: Fontinha Porto, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
description:
Boasting a bar, Fontinha Porto, Trademark Collection by Wyndham is situated in Porto in the Norte Region region, 1.3 km from Oporto Coliseum and 1.5 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests.

Sao Bento Train Station is 1.4 km from the hotel, while Clerigos Tower is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Fontinha Porto, Trademark Collection by Wyndham.

name: Portie Deluxe Suites by DA'HOME
description:
Located in Porto and within 800 metres of Carneiro Beach, Portie Deluxe Suites by DA'HOME features a restaurant, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 1 km from Ingleses Beach, 1.7 km from Molhe Beach and 4.2 km from Boavista Roundabout. Certain rooms at the property include a terrace with a sea view.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Portie Deluxe Suites by DA'HOME each room is equipped with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Music House is 4.7 km from Portie Deluxe Suites by DA'HOME, while Clerigos Tower is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Charmy Studio Porto
description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Charmy Studio Porto is located in Porto. The property is set 1.1 km from Clerigos Tower, 1.4 km from Boavista Roundabout and 1.9 km from Palacio da Bolsa. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Sao Bento Metro Station.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Music House. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Charmy Studio Porto.

name: The Downtown Charming Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 45m²
description:
The Downtown Charming Apartments offers accommodation within 800 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This recently renovated apartment is located 600 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 1.8 km from Campanha Train Station. The apartment has private entrance.

Each unit is fitted with a toaster, fridge, a coffee machine, as well as a stovetop and kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, all units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms also offer a terrace. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from The Downtown Charming Apartments.

name: bnapartments Carregal
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 20m²
description:
Offering an outdoor swimming pool and gardens, bnapartments Carregal is set on renovated a 17th-century palace located in the heart of Porto, an 8-minute walk from the Clerigos Tower. Free WiFi is provided.

The property features 16 carefully decorated studios, all equipped with air conditioning and a seating area with a flat-screen TV. A private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and toiletries is also featured and bed linen and towels are provided.

Each unit offers a fully equipped kitchenette fitted with a stovetop, a refrigerator, a microwave and a dishwasher machine. Other facilities include coffee machine and a toaster, and there is a dining table for guests’ convenience.

There is a small gym at the property where guests can exercise.

The iconic Lello bookstore is 450 metres from bnapartments Carregal. São Bento Railway Station, Aliados Avenue or the Bolhão Market are just 10 minutes walking. The nearest airport is Porto International Airport, 12.7 km from bnapartments Carregal.

name: 731 Costa Cabral Metro Residence
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 15m²
description:
Offering an outdoor pool, which may be covered and heated during cold weather, 731 Costa Cabral Metro Residence is set in Porto, at just 300 metres from the Combatentes Metro Station and a 6-minute metro ride from Aliados Avenue. It is within a centenary building in Porto, which was fully renovated in 2017, featuring wood and stone details.

Free WiFi is available. Various supermarkets, bakeries, restaurants, shops and cafes can be found within walking distance.

Estadio do Dragao is 1.1 km away. São João General Hospital is 1.7 km from 731 Costa Cabral Metro Residence, while City Market Bolhao is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 10 km from the property.

name: AVUS M Suites and Apartments by DA'HOME
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 45m²
description:
A recently renovated property, AVUS M Suites and Apartments by DA'HOME is located in Porto near Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment features family rooms.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit has bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including juice and cheese is served for the continental breakfast.

Clerigos Tower is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Music House is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from AVUS M Suites and Apartments by DA'HOME, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: ABC Hotel Porto - Boavista
description:
Located in Porto, 400 metres from Music House, ABC Hotel Porto - Boavista provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Certain rooms at the property include a terrace with a city view.

Boavista Roundabout is 400 metres from the hotel, while Clerigos Tower is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 12 km from ABC Hotel Porto - Boavista.

name: One Shot Palácio Cedofeita
description:
Situated in Porto and with Clerigos Tower reachable within 1.1 km, One Shot Palácio Cedofeita features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property has a year-round outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and garden.

At the hotel, each room has a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at One Shot Palácio Cedofeita have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms have a terrace. At the accommodation rooms include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near One Shot Palácio Cedofeita include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: GuestReady - Le Jardin Secret
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
In the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, close to Sao Bento Metro Station, GuestReady - Le Jardin Secret features free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is located 2.7 km from Palacio da Bolsa, 1.9 km from Ribeira Square and 3.5 km from Campanha Train Station. The property is less than 1 km from Oporto Coliseum, and within 900 metres of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from GuestReady - Le Jardin Secret.

name: Soho Porto
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 33m²
description:
A recently renovated apartment in Porto and within 1.2 km of Clerigos Tower, Soho Porto has a garden, comfortable soundproof rooms and free WiFi. This apartment offers air-conditioned accommodation with a patio. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchenette, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. At the apartment complex, the units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Music House. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from Soho Porto, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: HF Tuela Porto
description:
Situated at 10 minutes’ walk from the Douro River, HF Tuela Porto is located in Boavista, just 3 km from Porto's historic centre.

Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All of the rooms at the property include a cable TV, air conditioning a a private bathroom.

Guests can relax in the hotel bar, and there are also many restaurants and bars in the immediate vicinity of the hotel.

Nearby attractions include the Palacio de Cristal gardens, which feature panoramic Douro River views. The popular Península shopping centre is 5 minutes’ walk away. HF Tuela Porto is located just 4 km from the iconic Dom Luis I Bridge, which connects with Vila Nova de Gaia's riverside, the site of the Port Wine Cellars. It is a 15-minute drive from Porto International Airport.

name: Catarina Serviced Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 2 living rooms • 1 bathroom • 42m²
description:
Catarina Serviced Apartments features accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. The property has city and inner courtyard views, and is 700 metres from Oporto Coliseum. The accommodation offers a lift, full-day security and organising tours for guests.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is available for breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Catarina Serviced Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Renaissance Porto Lapa Hotel
description:
Set in Porto, 1.8 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, Renaissance Porto Lapa Hotel offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. The property has a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near Renaissance Porto Lapa Hotel include Sao Bento Train Station, Music House and Boavista Roundabout. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Internacional Porto
description:
Occupying a 19th-century building in Porto’s historical centre, Hotel Internacional features traditional Portuguese décor and an award-winning restaurant serving local gastronomy. The wine cellar houses a cosy bar.

Rooms at the Hotel Internacional Porto have floor-to-ceiling, double-glazed windows and a private bathroom with a tub. Each room also has a satellite TV.

A daily breakfast buffet is served in the hotel’s dining room, while Restaurant O Almada offers traditional flavours from Portugal. Guests can sample regional wines at O Almadinha Bar, as well as quick meals.

São Bento Train Station, at only 300 metres, offers easy connection to Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport. Aliados Metro Station is just 2 minutes’ walk away and there is a paid parking garage 50 metres from the hotel.

name: Tiara Downtown Apartments by DA'HOME
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Ideally set in Porto, Tiara Downtown Apartments by DA'HOME features a continental breakfast and free WiFi. This sustainable apartment is located 700 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 1.2 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. The apartment has family rooms.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a shower. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Campanha Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Tiara Downtown Apartments by DA'HOME, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Brewmaster's House
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 25m²
description:
Located next to the oldest brewpub in Porto, in a street full of bars and restaurants, The Brewmaster's House provides accommodation with free WiFi.

The air-conditioned studios and rooms include a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Most studios are equipped with a microwave, fridge, a coffee machine, a stovetop and kettle.

A craft beer is served as a complimentary welcome drink at check-in and tours to the brewery are available upon request.

Within walking distance from The Brewmaster's House, popular points of interest include City Market Bolhao, Clerigos Tower and Paris Galleries Street. Porto Airport is 11 km away.

name: Lounge Inn Guest House
description:
Featuring a terrace and free WiFi, Lounge Inn Guest House is situated in Porto, 2.2 km from City Market Bolhao and 2.7 km from Oporto Coliseum. 3.2 km from Lello Bookshop. Attractions in the area include Paris Galleries Street, 3.3 km away, or Estadio do Dragao, located 4.1 km from the property.

All rooms in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom, while certain rooms at Lounge Inn Guest House also feature a seating area.

The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the property.

name: Village Aparthotel By BOA
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Set in Porto, less than 1 km from Oporto Coliseum and 600 metres from the centre, Village Aparthotel By BOA offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a garden. This recently renovated aparthotel is located less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and a 9-minute walk from Sao Bento Train Station. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

The aparthotel provides guests with a patio, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Continental and vegetarian breakfast options with fruits, juice and cheese are available every morning at the aparthotel. A minimarket is available at the aparthotel.

The aparthotel has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near Village Aparthotel By BOA include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: GuestReady - Mushroom
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
GuestReady - Mushroom is set in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, 1.3 km from Oporto Coliseum, 1.3 km from Clerigos Tower and 2.5 km from Music House. It is located 1.2 km from Sao Bento Train Station and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sao Bento Metro Station is 1.3 km away.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a fridge, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near GuestReady - Mushroom include Boavista Roundabout, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Dragon Studio
description:
Dragon Studio is set in the Paranhos district of Porto, 2.2 km from Sao Bento Train Station, 2.4 km from Music House and 2.5 km from Boavista Roundabout. The property is located 2.6 km from Oporto Coliseum, 2.9 km from Clerigos Tower and 3.1 km from FC Porto Museum. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sao Bento Metro Station is 2.1 km away.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is featured. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Ferreira Borges Market is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Campanha Train Station is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from Dragon Studio.

name: HF Ipanema Porto
description:
HF Ipanema Porto is located in Boavista, 500 metres from the Boavista Roundabout. At 2.6 km from Porto's historic centre, it offers modern accommodation and 24-hour secure parking.

With free WiFi, all rooms have been refurbished and include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, double-glazed windows, a mini bar, and a fully contained bathroom. Room service is also available, at an extra cost. Specially furnished family rooms are also provided.

Guests can enjoy a variety of drinks at the bar. The surrounding area features various restaurant and pastry shop options. Many of the restaurants serve the city's signature dish, the Francesinha.

There is an on-site business centre and a new gym. Guests can make use of the laundry facilities, babysitting services, request for car rentals, tour and excursion arrangements.

At a 9-minute walk are the lush Crystal Palace Gardens, which feature panoramic Douro River and city views. The gardens are also home to a library and to the Romantic Museum. Soares dos Reis Museum is at 1 km, while the Music House is at a 10-minute walk. The Ipanema Porto is ia short drive from Aliados Avenue and from some of Porto's more well-known landmarks, such as the Clérigos Church and the São Bento Train Station.

name: ICON Duplo Ribeira
description:
Located in the centre of Porto, ICON Duplo Ribeira is situated 200 metres from Ribeira Square and 400 metres from Palacio da Bolsa. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests.

At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Each room has a safety deposit box, while selected rooms come with a balcony and others also offer city views. At ICON Duplo Ribeira the rooms have bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or Full English/Irish options.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ferreira Borges Market, Sao Bento Metro Station and Sao Bento Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from ICON Duplo Ribeira.

name: Santa Catarina - Pool & Fitness, by Oporto Collection - Adults Only
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 37m²
description:
Santa Catarina - Pool & Fitness, by Oporto Collection - Adults Only is located a 10-minute walk from some the main attractions of the city of Porto and features high quality appliances and furnishings as well as a swimming pool surrounded by turfy terraces.

The comfortable well-lit and spacious apartments come with air conditioning and an elegant decoration. Each includes a fully equipped kitchenette where guests can prepare their meals. Continental breakfast is available daily in a breakfast box.

The property offers a daytime reception service featuring luggage storage, common laundry and a lift. There is a washing machine in some of the apartments and a shared laundry.

The apartments are 400 metres from Avenida dos Aliados and 1 km from the Clérigos Tower. Dom Luís I Bridge, next to the Ribeira and the Port Wine Cellars, is 1.6 km away. Trindade Train Station is 1 km away and Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 15 km away.

name: Rua de Trás Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
situated in Porto's historic centre, Rua de Trás Apartments is 130 metres from the Clérigos Church.

 All rooms include a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine. one of the rooms feature a balcony with a view.

Popular points of interest near Rua de Trás Apartments are Paris Galleries Street, Lello Bookshop is 230 metres away. The historic São Bento Train Station is at 500 metres. Porto's Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is 15 km from the property and is reachable by metro.

name: Sheraton Porto Hotel & Spa
description:
Situated a 1-minute walk from Boavista Avenue, the Sheraton Porto Hotel & Spa offers spacious rooms and a modern spa.

The design guest rooms of the Sheraton Porto are decorated with a mix of wood, steel and glass. They come with a minibar, seating area and bathtub.

With the spa's 8 treatment rooms and indoor pool, guests can unwind completely after a busy day. Apart from a yoga studio, it offers various classes, a relaxation area and juice bar.

Guests can enjoy traditional Portuguese cuisine in the restaurant and complement their dinner with a tasty glass of wine. The hotel lobby’s piano bar offers pretty views of the hotel garden. The SL floor includes free Wi-Fi access.

The Sheraton Porto is situated 15 km from Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport. The Casa da Música Concert Hall and its adjacent metro station are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Charmy Studio Porto
description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Charmy Studio Porto is located in Porto. The property is set 1.1 km from Clerigos Tower, 1.4 km from Boavista Roundabout and 1.9 km from Palacio da Bolsa. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Sao Bento Metro Station.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Music House. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Charmy Studio Porto.

name: Moov Hotel Porto Centro
description:
Situated in a refurbished Art Deco cinema, Moov Hotel Porto Centro offers modern rooms with free WiFi. Porto train and metro stations have connections to Porto Airport, and are within a 3-minute walk from the hotel.

The modern, acclimatized rooms at Moov Hotel Porto Centro are decorated with cinematic photography. Each has a desk and a private bathroom.

A freshly prepared buffet-style breakfast is served daily at an extra charge. There is an inner courtyard terrace with tables and chairs for relaxing with a coffee.

The art gallery quarter and the São João National Theatre are just less than 10 minutes' walk.

name: Porto Formosa Central Lofts
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
Conveniently set in Porto, Porto Formosa Central Lofts provides a continental breakfast and free WiFi. This sustainable apartment is located 500 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. The property is close to popular attractions like Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square.

All of the air-conditioned units feature a private bathroom, flat-screen TV and fully equipped kitchen.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Campanha Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 18 km from Porto Formosa Central Lofts, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Serviced Apartments Boavista Palace
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 56m²
description:
This apartment complex in Porto is in the city’s business district, near Carolina Michaëlis Metro Station. It offers a terrace, a gym and apartments with a flat-screen TV. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The chic, contemporary apartments at Serviced Apartments Boavista Palace lead onto balconies. In the living room, guests can enjoy some cable TV on the plasma TV.

Meals prepared in the fully equipped kitchens can be served in the dining area. Modern bathrooms have under-floor heating.

The Apartments also offers a spacious terrace where guests can relax with drinks. A gym featuring modern equipment is also available.

Serviced Apartments Boavista Palace is just a 10-minute walk from the Praça Mouzinho de Albuquerque.

name: Oporto Serviced Apartments - 1858
description:
Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, Oporto Serviced Apartments bbgourmet is set in Porto, 800 metres from Paris Galleries Street. Clerigos Tower is 900 metres away. Private parking is available on site.

All units have a seating and dining area. A dishwasher and kettle are also featured. All units also have a kitchen or a kitchenette, fitted with an oven, a microwave, and a toaster. Bed linen is available.

Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, with packed lunches available on request.

City Market Bolhao is 1 km from Oporto Serviced Apartments bbgourmet, while Boavista Roundabout is 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 10 km from the property.

name: Musical View
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Musical View are apartments located in the centre of Porto, 500 metres from the Boavista Garden and the Casa da Música. They offer free WiFi and a panoramic view overlooking the city.

The apartments have 1 or 2 bedrooms and are equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, sofas and a dining area. Featuring a balcony, each apartment has 1 or 2 bathrooms and is accessible by elevator.

Guests staying at Musical View apartments will be able to prepare their own meals using the fully equipped kitchen available in each apartment. Alternatively guests can visit the traditional Portuguese restaurants located within 400 metres.

The Casa da Música Metro Station is a 6-minute walk away connecting guests to every part of Porto and surroundings. The Avenida dos Aliados is 3 km away and the Clérigos Tower is a 8-minute drive away. The Douro River and the Ribeira area are 3.8 km away. Porto International Airport is 12 km away.

name: Vera Cruz Porto Downtown Hotel
description:
Located 50 metres from Aliados Metro Station in the heart of Porto’s historic city centre. Vera Cruz Hotel offers a rooftop terrace with views across the Aliados Avenue and a 24-hour front desk.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Vera Cruz Hotel have double-glazed windows, satellite TV and private bathrooms with luxury amenities. Some rooms have a spacious work desk, and suites have private balconies.

Continental breakfast is prepared with local ingredients and can be enjoyed on the rooftop terrace. There are also many restaurants and bars within a few minutes’ walk.

By metro, Vera Cruz Hotel is 30 minutes' away from the Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport and by car, it is a 15 minutes' drive away.

name: HF Fenix Porto
description:
Standing tall in a commercial area of Porto’s Boavista district, HF Fénix Porto is 400 metres from Casa da Musica concert hall. It features free Wi-Fi throughout and spacious rooms with cable TV.

All rooms at the HF Fénix Porto are air conditioned and include a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Rooms on the upper floors offer full views of the Douro River.

A varied buffet breakfast consisting of pastries, breads, cereals, eggs, fruits and juices is served each morning in Fénix’s dining room, which boasts stained-glass features in the ceiling. There is a bar and an outdoor terrace with parasols.

The Fenix’s attentive, multilingual staff can provide babysitting services on request, arrange car rental and provide tourist information.

Cidade Do Porto shopping centre is next to the hotel and São Bento Train Station is 3 km away. Porto’s Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 12 km away.

name: Acta The Clover
description:
Located 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, Acta The Clover offers 4-star accommodation in Porto and features a shared lounge, a terrace and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Acta The Clover each room comes with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Acta The Clover include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Indulge Porto Flats
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 45m²
description:
Indulge Porto Flats is a sustainable apartment in the centre of Porto, less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from Sao Bento Train Station. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment provides city views, a sun terrace, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. Some units include a balcony and/or a patio with garden views and an outdoor dining area. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like cycling.

Popular points of interest near Indulge Porto Flats include Oporto Coliseum, Music House and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Merc Porto Clérigo's Place
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 43m²
description:
Right in the heart of Porto, Merc Porto Clérigo's Place has garden views from the terrace. With inner courtyard views, this accommodation provides a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is situated 500 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station.

With free WiFi, this apartment features a satellite flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Merc Porto Clérigo's Place, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Catalonia Porto
description:
Conveniently situated in the centre of Porto, Catalonia Porto provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. With a garden, the property also features a terrace, as well as a restaurant. Guests can make use of a bar.

At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room has a safety deposit box, while certain rooms include a balcony and others also offer garden views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

Guests at Catalonia Porto can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, French and Portuguese.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Catalonia Porto.

name: RVA - Clerigos Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 45m²
description:
RVA - Clerigos Apartments offers accommodation within 400 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. The air-conditioned accommodation is 200 metres from Clerigos Tower. Guests can access the apartment via private entrance.

At the apartment complex, the units are equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from RVA - Clerigos Apartments.

name: Hotel Aliados
description:
Situated in a historic building overlooking Aliados Avenue in the Porto centre, this hotel is just 50 metres from the Aliados Metro Station. The downstairs restaurant at Hotel Aliados is the emblematic Café Guarany, which also has nightly live music.

The Hotel Aliados' bright and comfortably furnished rooms feature large soundproofed windows with city views. Each is equipped with modern amenities including satellite TV and air conditioning. A private bathroom with free toiletries is included in each unit. Some rooms also have private balconies.

Guests can spend a night at the downstairs Café-Restaurant Guarany, which serves international cuisine. The schedule of live music rotates each night and includes traditional Portuguese fado singers. The surrounding area features a ariety of restaurants, most serving the popular and rich Porto cuisine.

The hotel’s tour desk is available to assist with car rental or in scheduling a day trip to Portugal’s Douro River region. Hotel reception is available 24 hours a day.

At just 400 metres is the pedestrian street of Santa Catarina, which houses a wide range of shops and boutiques. Porto's riverside, the Ribeira, is a UNESCO World Heritage site and is a 10-minute walk away. Scenic Parque de Serralves, home of Porto’s Museum of Contemporary Art, is just 3 km from Hotel Aliados. Porto's International Airport is a 30-minute drive away and is also reachable via metro.

name: Exe Essenzia Porto
description:
Attractively situated in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, Exe Essenzia Porto is situated 1.8 km from Palacio da Bolsa, 1.2 km from Music House and 1.7 km from Ferreira Borges Market. Featuring a fitness centre, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 1.1 km from Clerigos Tower.

At the hotel, every room comes with a wardrobe. Every room is fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV, and some rooms at Exe Essenzia Porto have a balcony. At the accommodation rooms include bed linen and towels.

Speaking English, Spanish and Portuguese, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception.

Popular points of interest near Exe Essenzia Porto include Boavista Roundabout, Ribeira Square and Sao Bento Metro Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Oporto Comfort Charming Cedofeita
description:
Set in the Cedofeita district in Porto, 800 metres from City Market Bolhao, Oporto Comfort Charming Cedofeita boasts air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property.

All rooms are fitted with a TV. Certain rooms include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Some units have views of the garden or city. Every room has a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower. For your comfort, you will find slippers and free toiletries.

Paris Galleries Street is 800 metres from Oporto Comfort Charming Cedofeita, while Clerigos Tower is 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 10 km from the property.

name: Alma da Casa by DA'HOME
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 65m²
description:
Alma da Casa by DA'HOME provides accommodation within 600 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This recently renovated apartment is located less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from Sao Bento Train Station. The apartment features family rooms.

All units are equipped with a toaster, fridge, a coffee machine, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms come with a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

A continental breakfast, comprising juice and cheese is served daily at the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Oporto Coliseum, Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Alma da Casa by DA'HOME, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Lemago Porto Apartments - Poveiros
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Offering free WiFi and garden views, Lemago Porto Apartments - Poveiros is an accommodation set in the heart of Porto, just 200 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 800 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station. This sustainable apartment is located 700 metres from Sao Bento Train Station and 1.1 km from Clerigos Tower. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

At the apartment complex, the units come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like hiking.

Popular points of interest near Lemago Porto Apartments - Poveiros include Campanha Train Station, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Belomonte 20 Apartments Porto World Heritage
description:
In a 17th-century building, Belomonte 20 Apartments Porto World Heritage combine original beams and stone walls with modern design. In Porto’s historic centre, they are 6 minutes’ walk from Ribeira Square by the Douro River.

Offering free broadband Internet, the studios are accessed via a brightly coloured staircase. Each has large windows, wooden floors and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Some overlook Porto Cathedral and one has a terrace.

All include a kitchenette with microwave, fridge and stove. Free olive oil, vinegar and teas are provided. There is a supermarket 1 minute’s walk away and lots of restaurants and bars within a 10-minute walk.

Porto Cathedral is a 5-minute walk away, while the main square at Avenida Aliados is less than 10 minutes’ walk. São Bento Station is a 6-minute walk from Apartments Belomonte, and provides train and Metro links throughout the city.

name: The Downtown Charming Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 45m²
description:
The Downtown Charming Apartments offers accommodation within 800 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This recently renovated apartment is located 600 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 1.8 km from Campanha Train Station. The apartment has private entrance.

Each unit is fitted with a toaster, fridge, a coffee machine, as well as a stovetop and kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, all units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms also offer a terrace. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from The Downtown Charming Apartments.

name: Laranjais Boutique Suites & Apartments Porto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 41m²
description:
Conveniently located in the centre of Porto, Laranjais Boutique Suites & Apartments Porto offers vegan breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, a shower and slippers. All rooms have a coffee machine, while selected rooms also offer a balcony and others also have city views. At Laranjais Boutique Suites & Apartments Porto each room has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Laranjais Boutique Suites & Apartments Porto, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ribeira Historic Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 45m²
description:
Located within 300 metres of Ribeira Square and 300 metres of Palacio da Bolsa in the centre of Porto, Ribeira Historic Apartments provides accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 100 metres from Ferreira Borges Market. Featuring a private entrance, the apartment allows guests to maintain their privacy.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Ribeira Historic Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Dom Henrique - Downtown
description:
Located in Porto's city centre, this recently renovated hotel offers a bar with panoramic views and  17º Restaurant & Bar serving traditional Portuguese cuisine. Trindade Metro Station is 200 metres from the hotel and connects with Porto International Airport.

Air-conditioned rooms at Dom Henrique Hotel are decorated with warm colours and contemporary  furniture. All rooms have a minibar, TV, and an en modern private bathroom.

The Cosmopolitan 17º Bar features a deck with scenic city views and provides a resident DJ and guests on Fridays, Saturdays and holiday eves. Restaurant Além-Mar features a tiled wall created by Júlio Resende, a famous contemporary Portuguese artist.

Hotel Dom Henrique has a 24-hour front desk and can organize citywide excursions and car rentals for guests. It also offers free high-speed WiFi access in all areas.

Dom Henrique is in the centre of the entertainment district, with Clérigos Tower less than 5 minutes’ walk away and Aliados Avenue a 3-minute walk. It is 600 metres away from Rua Santa Catarina and Via Catarina shopping venues. Porto International Airport is 16 km away from the Hotel Dom Henrique.

name: SIZE Flats Clérigos
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
SIZE Flats Clérigos provides accommodation within 400 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This sustainable apartment is located 500 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and 500 metres from Sao Bento Train Station. The apartment features family rooms.

All units are equipped with a toaster, fridge, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms include a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near SIZE Flats Clérigos include Clerigos Tower, Oporto Coliseum and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Suite na baixa do Porto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 58m²
description:
Featuring garden views, Suite na baixa do Porto is situated in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, 1.6 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 1.6 km from Sao Bento Train Station. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

If you would like to discover the area, cycling and pub crawls are possible in the surroundings and the apartment can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Popular points of interest near Suite na baixa do Porto include Music House, Boavista Roundabout and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: bnapartments Carregal
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 20m²
description:
Offering an outdoor swimming pool and gardens, bnapartments Carregal is set on renovated a 17th-century palace located in the heart of Porto, an 8-minute walk from the Clerigos Tower. Free WiFi is provided.

The property features 16 carefully decorated studios, all equipped with air conditioning and a seating area with a flat-screen TV. A private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and toiletries is also featured and bed linen and towels are provided.

Each unit offers a fully equipped kitchenette fitted with a stovetop, a refrigerator, a microwave and a dishwasher machine. Other facilities include coffee machine and a toaster, and there is a dining table for guests’ convenience.

There is a small gym at the property where guests can exercise.

The iconic Lello bookstore is 450 metres from bnapartments Carregal. São Bento Railway Station, Aliados Avenue or the Bolhão Market are just 10 minutes walking. The nearest airport is Porto International Airport, 12.7 km from bnapartments Carregal.

name: 733 Costa Cabral Metro Residence
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 15m²
description:
Set in Porto, 733 Costa Cabral Metro Residence is at just 300 metres from the Combatentes Metro Station and a 6-minute metro ride from Aliados Avenue. It is within a centenary building in Porto, which was fully renovated in 2017, featuring wood and stone details.

733 Costa Cabral Metro Residence also includes an outdoor area with a private pool, covered and heated during cold weather. Free WiFi is available.

A variety of supermarkets, bakeries, restaurants, shops and cafés can be found within walking distance.

FC Porto's Dragon Stadium is a 15-minute walk away. São João General Hospital is 1.7 km from 733 Costa Cabral Metro Residence. Porto Airport is 10 km away.

name: Fontinha Square Apartments by Porto City Hosts
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set in Porto and with Oporto Coliseum reachable within 1.2 km, Fontinha Square Apartments by Porto City Hosts offers express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. The property features inner courtyard views and is 1.4 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 1.3 km from Sao Bento Train Station. The apartment has family rooms.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning and features a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

Clerigos Tower is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Palacio da Bolsa is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Fontinha Square Apartments by Porto City Hosts, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Chic & Basic Gravity
description:
Located in Porto, 700 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station, Chic & Basic Gravity provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 700 metres from Sao Bento Train Station.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Chic & Basic Gravity each room has bed linen and towels.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Oporto Coliseum, Clerigos Tower and Boavista Roundabout. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Chic & Basic Gravity.

name: Lunar Guest House
description:
Residencial Lunar offer budget rooms, a 5-minute walk from Porto’s Praça da Batalha.

Rooms at Residencial Lunar are simply furnished and include a private bathroom with shower as well as cable TV. Some rooms have beautifully decorated ceilings.

Guests at Residencial Lunar  can benefit from a 24-hour reception, a laundry service and room service.

The residence is situated a 10-minute walk away from Porto Cathedral and the São Bento Train Station. The Bolhão and Campo 24 de Agosto Metro Stations are a 5-minute walk away and offer direct access to Porto’s airport.

name: Pur Oporto Boutique Hotel by actahotels
description:
Conveniently set in the centre of Porto, Pur Oporto Boutique Hotel by actahotels provides air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

At the hotel, each room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Pur Oporto Boutique Hotel by actahotels offers certain rooms that include a terrace, and every room comes with a coffee machine. All units feature a safety deposit box.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Oporto Coliseum, Sao Bento Metro Station and Sao Bento Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Pur Oporto Boutique Hotel by actahotels.

name: Axis Porto Business & Spa Hotel
description:
Axis Porto Hotel is situated beside Porto University campus, 3 km from the UNESCO World Heritage Centre of Porto. The hotel features a spa centre and panoramic city views.

All guest rooms at the Axis Porto feature satellite TV, minibar and air conditioning. In addition, the hotel rooms all have balconies.

The hotel’s modern spa is equipped with a dynamic pool, sauna, Turkish baths and shower. A full range of relaxation and massage treatments is available.

The restaurant at Hotel Axis Porto offers a fusion of Italian and international cuisine. There is also a living room and a terrace with a bar, where guests can relax with a drink.

Axis Porto Business & Spa Hotel is located just 15 minutes’ drive from Porto International Airport. The nearest Metro station is 900 metres away, and on-site car parking is also available.

Axis is taking part in an initiative of corporate social responsibility, integrating into its team people with intellectual disabilities.

name: Casa Portugueza Experience
description_short: Entire villa • 4 bedrooms • 1 living room • 3 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 400m²
description:
Surrounded by views of the inner courtyard, Casa Portugueza Experience is a sustainable apartment in Porto, offering guests an environmentally friendly accommodation close to FC Porto Museum. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers bike hire and features a garden and outdoor fireplace.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and garden views features 4 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 3 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and fruits. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

In the warmer months, you can make use of the barbecue facilities and dine on the private balcony.

For guests with children, the apartment provides a baby safety gate. A car rental service is available at Casa Portugueza Experience.

Estadio do Dragao is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Campanha Train Station is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Casa Portugueza Experience.

name: Porto Formosa Central Lofts
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
Conveniently set in Porto, Porto Formosa Central Lofts provides a continental breakfast and free WiFi. This sustainable apartment is located 500 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. The property is close to popular attractions like Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square.

All of the air-conditioned units feature a private bathroom, flat-screen TV and fully equipped kitchen.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Campanha Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 18 km from Porto Formosa Central Lofts, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Santa Catarina Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 75m²
description:
Set in the centre of Porto, 300 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 700 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station, Santa Catarina Apartments offers free WiFi and air conditioning. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchenette, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 18 km from Santa Catarina Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Luxury Oasis in Bonfim by LovelyStay
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 44m²
description:
Offering garden views, Luxury Oasis in Bonfim by LovelyStay is an accommodation set in Porto, less than 1 km from Oporto Coliseum and 2.1 km from FC Porto Museum. The property is around 3.3 km from Estadio do Dragao, 3.4 km from Ribeira Square and 2 km from Ferreira Borges Market. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Campanha Train Station is 1.3 km away.

This apartment has 1 bedroom, a kitchenette with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Luxury Oasis in Bonfim by LovelyStay.

name: Eurostars Heroismo
description:
Located in Porto, the 4-star Eurostars Heroismo is just in front of Heroismo Metro Station and also has an outstanding parking. Porto’s central Aliados Avenue is just 1.5 km away, while the Douro riverside area is at a 15-minute walk.

Featuring a work desk, the comfortable rooms at the Heroismo are air conditioned and have a flat-screen TV, as well as WiFi access and a minibar. Each bathroom includes a bath or shower and comes with a hairdryer, as well as free toiletries.

Breakfast service is available each morning at the Eurostars restaurant, featuring a variety of fresh local products. Guests of the hotel can find a wide range of popular restaurants and eateries in Porto’s historic centre, which is a short metro ride away. Room service is also available, at an extra fee.

Following a day of discovering the city, guests are welcome to unwind in the lounge area and enjoy a cocktail or drink from the on site bar. Eurostars Heroismo provides a multitude of services to its guests, such as a lounge, bar, laundry, ironing, daily cleaning and a 24-hour front desk. Meeting rooms and a business centre are also featured.

Porto’s historic Clérigos Tower and São Bento Train Station are within a 15-minute walk. At a 20-minute walk are the lively Galerias de Paris, Porto’s main bar area, where patrons can enjoy their drinks indoors or on the pedestrian street facing the establishments. Campanhã Train Station is just one metro stop away from Heroísmo. The Eurostars Heroismo is 19.5 km from Porto’s Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport, which can be reached within 35 minutes via metro.

name: Almada Apartments 468
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 38m²
description:
Almada Apartments 468 are located in Porto, 120 metres from Aliados avenue. City Market Bolhao and Aliados metro station are both 500 metres from the property. Free WiFi is offered.

Almada Apartment 468's apartments feature a seating area and some have a terrace and/or patio.  Every unit is equipped with a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries. Bed linen is available.

Guests can prepare their meals in the equipped kitchen, fitted with a stovetop, a microwave, a toaster and a refrigerator. Alternatively, a variety of restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk.

Almada Apartments offers a private check-in.

The famous Lello Bookshop and Paris Galleries Street are 650 metres from Almada Apartments 468. The iconic São Bento Station and its metro stop are 800 metres away. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 15 km from Almada Apartments 468.

name: DL 205
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set in the centre of Porto, just 400 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 800 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station, DL 205 offers accommodation with city views and free WiFi. The property is around 1.2 km from Ferreira Borges Market, 1.7 km from Campanha Train Station and 1.1 km from Clerigos Tower. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near DL 205 include Sao Bento Train Station, Ribeira Square and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Cristo Rei
description:
Attractively located in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, Hotel Cristo Rei is situated 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, 1 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 2.2 km from Campanha Train Station. Each accommodation at the 1-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a shared lounge and to a bar. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 500 metres from Oporto Coliseum.

At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer, rooms at Hotel Cristo Rei also boast free WiFi, while some rooms include a balcony.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Hotel Cristo Rei, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Oporto City View - Santa Catarina
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 49m²
description:
Featuring garden views, Oporto Serviced Apartments - Alvares Cabral provides accommodation with patio, around 1.5 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. The property features city views and is 1.5 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 1.8 km from Oporto Coliseum. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The units at the apartment complex are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Guests can eat in the on-site family-friendly restaurant, which is open for dinner, lunch, cocktails and high tea.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Music House, Clerigos Tower and Boavista Roundabout. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Oporto Serviced Apartments - Alvares Cabral, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Porto Palácio Hotel by The Editory
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 60m²
description:
Serralves Vintage House is a sustainable apartment in Porto, where guests can make the most of its garden and terrace. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.5 km from Molhe Beach. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also provide guests with free WiFi, while some rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the apartment complex, all units include bed linen and towels.

Ingleses Beach is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Carneiro Beach is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 12 km from Serralves Vintage House, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: OPORTO GUEST Moinho de Vento Studios
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 111m²
description:
Well set in the Paranhos district of Porto, E36 - ideal for families - large areas is a sustainable apartment located 2.5 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 2.6 km from Sao Bento Train Station. The property invites guests to reconnect with nature and encourages them to make eco-friendly travel choices. The property is around 2.6 km from Boavista Roundabout, 3 km from Oporto Coliseum and 3.3 km from Clerigos Tower. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Music House is 2.5 km away.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

FC Porto Museum is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Palacio da Bolsa is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 13 km from E36 - ideal for families - large areas.

name: Portus Cale Hotel
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 26m²
description:
Boasting a garden and views of city, FindMe InPorto Bonfim is a recently renovated apartment located in Porto, 1.1 km from Campanha Train Station. With inner courtyard views, this accommodation provides a patio. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, an oven, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. All units include a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while some rooms will provide you with a balcony and some have garden views. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

If you prefer to cook in the comfort of your own place, you can make use of the kitchenette facilities, which include a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near FindMe InPorto Bonfim include Oporto Coliseum, FC Porto Museum and Sao Bento Metro Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Antero Quental Residence
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 15m²
description:
Offering an outdoor pool, which may be covered and heated during cold weather, 731 Costa Cabral Metro Residence is set in Porto, at just 300 metres from the Combatentes Metro Station and a 6-minute metro ride from Aliados Avenue. It is within a centenary building in Porto, which was fully renovated in 2017, featuring wood and stone details.

Free WiFi is available. Various supermarkets, bakeries, restaurants, shops and cafes can be found within walking distance.

Estadio do Dragao is 1.1 km away. São João General Hospital is 1.7 km from 731 Costa Cabral Metro Residence, while City Market Bolhao is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 10 km from the property.

name: AVUS M Suites and Apartments by DA'HOME
description_short: Shared dormitory room
description:
Conveniently located in central Porto, this hostel has free WiFi throughout. Featuring rooms and dormitories, the unit is just 650 metres from the famed Aliados Avenue.

The Porto Republica is set in a renovated historic building, with wooden floors and an elegant and clean décor. All dormitories come with access to shared bathroom facilities. Some of the private rooms have their own bathroom, while others access shared bathroom facilities. Some rooms include a flat-screen cable TV. A daily cleaning service is provided

This hostel’s guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the communal kitchen at their disposal. There’s also a bar, where guests can get a drink to enjoy in the on-site lounge area. A wide range of eateries and restaurants are accessible within a short 5-minute walk, many of them serving the local Francesinha delicacy.

Guests of the Porto Republica Hostel & Suites have a 24-hour front desk at their disposal, which can provide assistance in various matters, like renting bicycles, arranging an airport shuttle or even getting advice on the city’s top spots.

Trindade Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away and connects with most of the greater Porto area. At just a 10-minute walk are the Clérigos Tower and the lively Galerias de Paris nightlife quarter. The famous Lello Bookshop is also within a 10-minute walk. The nearest airport is Porto International Airport, 14.6 km from Porto Republica Hostel & Suites and also accessible via metro.

name: Porto Republica Hostel & Suites
description:
