Family-run Oporto House is located in a historic neighbourhood in central Porto, a 5-minute walk from Clérigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa. Its rooms have natural stone walls and antique, wooden furniture.

Decorated in bright colours, each room has a fan and private bathroom. Some rooms include a balcony, city views or sloped ceilings.

A continental breakfast is available and there is a snack bar. Lots of restaurants and bars can be found within a 10-minute walk.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide tourist information and arrange massages, and car and bicycle hire. City Market Bolhao is 600 metres from the property, while the Palacio de Cristal gardens are 15 minutes’ away via a route passing the University of Porto.

Located within 5 minutes’ walk are Aliados Metro Station and São Bento Train Station, offering  direct access to the rest of the city. Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is a 20-minute drive from OportoHouse.

name: Oporto Serviced Apartments - Alvares Cabral
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 25m²
description:
Featuring an infinity pool, PipaD'oro by YoursPorto is a sustainable apartment located in a historic building in the centre of Porto, close to Clerigos Tower. The property features garden and city views, and is 500 metres from Palacio da Bolsa. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a desk. All units come with a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms have a terrace and some have river views. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Continental and gluten-free breakfast options with local specialities, fresh pastries and fruits are available daily at the apartment. There is a coffee shop, bar and lounge.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity. Guests at PipaD'oro by YoursPorto can enjoy hiking nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ferreira Borges Market, Ribeira Square and Sao Bento Metro Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from PipaD'oro by YoursPorto.

name: Cedofeita Charming Flat
description:
Centrally located in Porto, Stay Hotel Porto Centro Trindade is a 3-star accommodation at a 5-minute walk from Trindade Metro Station and 10 minutes from Aliados Avenue. The Bolhão market is at 600 metres, while the iconic Clérigos Church is at a 20-minute walk.

Free WiFi is included and all rooms are equipped with a flat-screen cable TV. Each room also has a kettle, wardrobe and air conditioning. All rooms include a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer.

A continental or buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. A wide range of restaurants is available in the vicinity, many within a 5 to 10-minute walk. Among the city's gastronomic specialities is the famed Francesinha.

At 300 metres is the start of the pedestrian portion of Santa Catarina Street, a renowned shopping street which also houses the emblematic Majestic Café. At a 15-minute walk are the Paris Galleries, a popular nighttime hotspot, filled with bars and cafés.  Porto's Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is 16 km from the property and is reachable via metro.

name: Regras 45 Building A by LovelyStay
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
Set in Porto within 500 metres of City Market Bolhao, Oporto Invite - Santa Catarina offers accommodation with seating area and a kitchenette. Complimentary WiFi is provided.

The apartment offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hair dryer and shower. An oven and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine.

Ferreira Borges Market is 2.7 km from Oporto Invite - Santa Catarina. Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 16 km away.

name: Arco Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 45m²
description:
A recently renovated property, AVUS M Suites and Apartments by DA'HOME is located in Porto near Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment features family rooms.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit has bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including juice and cheese is served for the continental breakfast.

Clerigos Tower is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Music House is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from AVUS M Suites and Apartments by DA'HOME, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: E36 - ideal for families - large areas
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Arco Apartments provides accommodation within 600 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The property features river and garden views, and is 300 metres from Ribeira Square. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

Each unit is equipped with a toaster, fridge, a coffee machine, as well as a stovetop and kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms include a seating area. At the apartment complex, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available nearby. Guests can also relax in the garden.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Sao Bento Metro Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Arco Apartments.

name: Arts Hotel Porto, Tapestry Collection By Hilton
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Featuring city views, RS Porto Apartments is situated in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, 2.3 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 2.4 km from Music House. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sao Bento Metro Station is 2.2 km away.

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the apartment.

Boavista Roundabout is 2.5 km from RS Porto Apartments, while Oporto Coliseum is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: 731 Costa Cabral Metro Residence
description:
Boasting a garden, a restaurant as well as a bar, Arts Hotel Porto, Tapestry Collection By Hilton is situated in the centre of Porto, 800 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 700 metres from Sao Bento Train Station.

At the hotel rooms have air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Certain rooms are fitted with a kitchen with a dishwasher. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options.

Arts Hotel Porto, Tapestry Collection By Hilton offers a sun terrace.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Oporto Coliseum, Ribeira Square and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Arts Hotel Porto, Tapestry Collection By Hilton.

name: OportoHouse
description:
Centrally located in Porto’s prestigious Boavista district, a few minutes’ from Casa da Musica, BessaHotel offers a fitness centre and a Turkish bath. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The air-conditioned luxurious rooms of BessaHotel are decorated in a modern style. All rooms have a work desk and a satellite/cable flat screen TV with Chromecast connectivity and video on demand. Some rooms have large terrace-style balconies with views of the city.

Featuring a 24-hour reception, BessaHotel provides a business centre. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and laundry facilities.

BessaHotel is 200 metres from Bessa Stadium and 1.6 km from Serralves Contemporary Art Museum. The Francos Metro Station is 1 km away and Porto International Airport is 12 km away.

name: Stay Hotel Porto Centro Trindade
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 12m²
description:
Attractively set in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, OPORTO GUEST Moinho de Vento Studios is situated 1.3 km from Palacio da Bolsa, 1.2 km from Ferreira Borges Market and 1.3 km from Ribeira Square. The property is around 2.4 km from Music House, 1.1 km from Oporto Coliseum and 1.6 km from D. Luis I Bridge. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 500 metres from Clerigos Tower.

With a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also boast free WiFi.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Boavista Roundabout. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from OPORTO GUEST Moinho de Vento Studios.

name: Serralves Vintage House
description:
Featuring a rooftop lounge with panoramic Porto and Douro River views, 5-star Porto Palacio has a luxurious spa with massage rooms, squash court, fitness centre and an indoor pool. The Casa da Musica is 8 minutes’ walk away.

Decorated in a modern style, the spacious, soundproofed rooms have a 26-inch, flat-screen satellite TV, seating area and minibar. The marble private bathrooms include underfloor heating. All rooms feature free WiFi access.

Located on Avenida da Boavista, Porto Palácio Hotel by The Editory is a 7-minute walk from Estádio do Bessa. Casa da Música and Francos metro stations are both less than a 15-minute walk from the hotel. The city centre is around 15 minutes’ drive away. Porto International Airport is 13.4 km from the hotel.

name: PipaD'oro by YoursPorto
description:
Featuring Douro River views and free Wi-Fi, Oporto Street Fonte Taurina - Riverfront Suites is in the heart of Porto’s Ribeira district. It offers rooms that combine modern and retro features.

With hardwood floors, each room has a flat-screen TV and private bathroom. Some include a river view.

A daily breakfast buffet is provided. Several typical Portuguese restaurants, many offering seafood, are within a 3-minute walk.

Praça da Ribeira Square is 2 minutes’ walk away, as are Porto Cathedral and the historic Palácio da Bolsa and Casa do Infante.  The Church of St Francis is 5 minutes’ walk away and Torre dos Clérigos and Lello’s Bookstore are within 15 minutes’ walk.

Stops for trams, buses and river cruises are a 5-minute walk from Oporto Street Fonte Taurina - Riverfront Suites. The iron Luís I Bridge is 400 metres away, and across the bridge in Vila de Gaia are the city’s port wine cellars. São Bento Train Station is 800 metres away.

name: Boavista Class Inn
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 25m²
description:
Set within 1.2 km of Sao Bento Train Station and 1.3 km of Oporto Coliseum in Porto, Regras 45 Building A by LovelyStay offers accommodation with seating area. The property is around 2.5 km from Music House, 2.6 km from Palacio da Bolsa and 1.9 km from Ribeira Square. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sao Bento Metro Station is 1.3 km away.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Clerigos Tower, Boavista Roundabout and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Regras 45 Building A by LovelyStay.

name: BessaHotel Boavista
description:
In the heart of Porto, set within a short distance of Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa, Cedofeita Charming Flat offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a toaster and coffee machine. With city views, this accommodation offers a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Music House.

This apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, a kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ferreira Borges Market, Boavista Roundabout and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Cedofeita Charming Flat, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: FindMe InPorto Bonfim
description:
Situated on Porto’s Avenida da Boavista, Portus Cale Hotel offers bright, air-conditioned rooms and a daily buffet breakfast. The Douro Riverfront is just 2 km from the hotel.

Guests rooms at Portus Cale Hotel have wood furniture and cable TV.  Each includes an en suite bathroom stocked a hairdryer and free bathroom amenities. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

Guests can enjoy a glass of port wine in the lobby bar, which is open from 10:30 to 01:00. Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception desk can arrange car rental and facilitate the on-site business centre.

The famous Casa da Musica is only a 5-minute walk, while Sá Carneiro Airport is 12 km away. A tourist bus and public transport is conveniently available just outside Portus Cale.

name: RS Porto Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Boasting a rooftop pool and views of river, 108MM House is a sustainable apartment set in Porto, 2.2 km from Clerigos Tower. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

All units feature air conditioning and a cable flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and bathrobes, units at the apartment complex also feature free WiFi, while selected rooms also feature a terrace. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests may eat in the on-site modern restaurant, which is open for lunch, brunch and cocktails.

Guests can also relax in the garden or in the shared lounge area.

Palacio da Bolsa is 2.2 km from the apartment, while Ferreira Borges Market is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from 108MM House, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ando Living - Flores Townhouse
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 26m²
description:
Offering a terrace, Antero Quental Residence is a centenary refurbished building set in the Lapa district in Porto. City Market Bolhao is 1.2 km away. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

All units include a dining area and a seating area with a cable flat-screen TV. Some units have a terrace and/or balcony with city views. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a kettle. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, fitted with a fridge. There is a private bathroom with a shower in every unit, along with free toiletries. Bed linen is provided.

Across the street there is a supermarket, and guests can find restaurants, bakeries, shops and coffees within walking distance.

Aliados Avenue and Clérigos Tower are around 20 minutes' walking from Antero Quental Residence. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 10 km from the property, and Faria Guimarães Metro Station is a 5-minute walk.

name: Oporto Street Fonte Taurina - Riverfront Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 40m²
description:
Ando Living - Flores Townhouse provides accommodation within 400 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The air-conditioned accommodation is 200 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station. Outdoor seating allows guests to sit outside and enjoy the good weather.

At the apartment complex, all units have a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units at the apartment complex are equipped with a seating area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Ribeira Square and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Ando Living - Flores Townhouse.

name: 108MM House
description:
Located in a restored 2-storey house, Boavista Class Inn offers contemporary and sober accommodation in Porto. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and the indoor courtyard.

Rooms have a flat-screen TV, free WiFi and views of the interior courtyard or to Casa da Música. Every room has a private bathroom.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Music House is 50 metres from Boavista Class Inn, while Casa da Musica Metro Station is 100 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Outsite Porto Mouco
description:
Situated in Porto, 800 metres from Campanha Train Station, Outsite Porto Mouco features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.6 km from Oporto Coliseum.

The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Outsite Porto Mouco rooms include bed linen and towels.

Sao Bento Metro Station is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Sao Bento Train Station is 2.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Outsite Porto Mouco.

name: Marquês Garden House by Olivia
description:
Boasting an outdoor swimming pool and views of garden, Marquês Garden House by Olivia is a sustainable bed and breakfast located in Porto, 2.3 km from Oporto Coliseum. The property features city views and is 2.4 km from FC Porto Museum and 2.6 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

All units feature air conditioning and a cable flat-screen TV. All units include a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while some rooms will provide you with a balcony and some have pool views. At the bed and breakfast, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Sao Bento Train Station is 2 km from Marquês Garden House by Olivia, while Music House is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Oporto Yellow Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 40m²
description:
Located 500 metres from Boavista Roundabout, Oporto Yellow Apartments offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. With a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Music House is 700 metres from the apartment, while Clerigos Tower is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 13 km from Oporto Yellow Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Porto Santa Maria Apartments
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Porto Santa Maria Apartments is located in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, 1.9 km from Oporto Coliseum, 2.5 km from Music House and 2.6 km from Boavista Roundabout. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.9 km from Sao Bento Train Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sao Bento Metro Station is 1.9 km away.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchen features an oven, a microwave and a toaster. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Clerigos Tower is 1.9 km from the apartment, while FC Porto Museum is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from Porto Santa Maria Apartments.
