description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
In the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, close to Sao Bento Metro Station, GuestReady - Le Jardin Secret features free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is located 2.7 km from Palacio da Bolsa, 1.9 km from Ribeira Square and 3.5 km from Campanha Train Station. The property is less than 1 km from Oporto Coliseum, and within 900 metres of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from GuestReady - Le Jardin Secret.

name: Porto Hostel Cúpula
description:
Set in Porto and within 1.3 km of Campanha Train Station, Porto Hostel Cúpula features a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Ribeira Square, Clerigos Tower, and D. Luis I Bridge. The hostel has family rooms.

At the hostel, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. At Porto Hostel Cúpula every room includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Oporto Coliseum, Sao Bento Metro Station and Sao Bento Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 18 km from Porto Hostel Cúpula, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Eurostars Aliados
description:
Eurostars Aliados has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Porto. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Eurostars Aliados the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Eurostars Aliados include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the hotel.

name: B. Arts
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
B. Arts features accommodation in studios and lofts located in Porto, just 1 km from central Aliados Avenue. The units are set in a renovated 19th century building and have city views, just 150 metres from the Porto Library, São Lázaro Garden and 500 metres from Coliseu do Porto.

Both studios and lofts feature an equipped kitchenette and a living area, with sofa and flat-screen cable TV. Each includes a private bathroom. The loft features a bed which is accessible through stairs. Free WiFi access is available.

Guests may prepare their own meals in the kitchenette of each self-catering accommodation. Alternatively, various restaurants are available within a short 5-minute walk. Among the local specialities are Francesinha and Tripas à Moda do Porto.

Campo 24 de Agosto Metro Station is 450 metres from the property and connects with most of the Porto area. The unit is a short walk from the Porto Arts Academy. Bicycle and car rental services are available. Historical São Bento Train Station is 700 metres away, while the Clérigos Tower and Galerias de Paris are 1.3 km away. B. Arts is 18 km from Porto International Airport.

name: Clérigos Boutique Apartments by Homing
description_short: Entire studio • 1 kitchen • 20m²
description:
Clérigos Boutique Apartments by Homing features accommodation within 400 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and kitchenware. The property is situated 700 metres from Ribeira Square, 300 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and 400 metres from Sao Bento Train Station. Oporto Coliseum is less than 1 km away and Music House is 2.8 km from the apartment.

All units feature air conditioning and a satellite TV. The units are fitted with a private bathroom with a shower. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Clérigos Boutique Apartments by Homing.

name: Comfortable&Central w/balcony-9 min walk Trindade
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set within the União de Freguesias do Centro district in Porto, Comfortable&Central w/balcony-9 min walk Trindade has air conditioning, a patio, and city views. It is located 1.1 km from Sao Bento Train Station and offers a lift. The property is 1.2 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, and within 700 metres of the city centre.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with garden views. The unit has soundproofing and a shower. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Oporto Coliseum, Clerigos Tower and Boavista Roundabout. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Comfortable&Central w/balcony-9 min walk Trindade, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Soho Porto
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 33m²
description:
A recently renovated apartment in Porto and within 1.2 km of Clerigos Tower, Soho Porto has a garden, comfortable soundproof rooms and free WiFi. This apartment offers air-conditioned accommodation with a patio. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchenette, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. At the apartment complex, the units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Music House. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from Soho Porto, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Morar Apartments Porto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 56m²
description:
Situated in the centre of Porto, just 200 metres from Clerigos Tower and 700 metres from Palacio da Bolsa, Morar Apartments Porto features accommodation with garden views and free WiFi. The property has city and inner courtyard views, and is 500 metres from Ferreira Borges Market. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace.

At the apartment complex, units have air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property. Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Morar Apartments Porto.

name: Regras 45 Building B by LovelyStay
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 23m²
description:
Situated within 1.2 km of Sao Bento Train Station and 1.3 km of Oporto Coliseum in Porto, Regras 45 Building B by LovelyStay features accommodation with seating area. The property is around 2.5 km from Music House, 2.6 km from Palacio da Bolsa and 1.9 km from Ribeira Square. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sao Bento Metro Station is 1.3 km away.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Clerigos Tower, Boavista Roundabout and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Regras 45 Building B by LovelyStay.

name: Oporto Lovely House
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Surrounded by views of the quiet street, Oporto Lovely House is a sustainable apartment in Porto, offering guests an environmentally friendly accommodation close to Campanha Train Station. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features rooms with air conditioning, free private parking and free WiFi.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, inner courtyard views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like hiking.

Popular points of interest near Oporto Lovely House include FC Porto Museum, Oporto Coliseum and Estadio do Dragao. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 17 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: House of Artists
description:
Offering city views, House of Artists is an accommodation situated in Porto, 600 metres from Ferreira Borges Market and 300 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station. The air-conditioned accommodation is 700 metres from Palacio da Bolsa. The property is 200 metres from Clerigos Tower, and within 300 metres of the city centre.

Each unit comes with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a well-fitted kitchenette, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with bathrobes. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the bed and breakfast.

Popular points of interest near House of Artists include Sao Bento Train Station, Ribeira Square and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Cristal Porto
description:
Hotel Cristal Porto is a new 4-star hotel in a central location in Porto. Set right next to Lapa Church, the hotel is 900 metres from Aliados Avenue.

Modern rooms vary from Standard to Deluxe and Suites. Each one includes air conditioning, mini-bar, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Free WiFi is offered.

A garden gives guests the tranquility away from the hustle and bustle of the city. A buffet restaurant is available, as well as a bar where Port wine can be tasted. Breakfast is served from 07:30 to 10:30.

The 24-hour reception can help guests with car rental, luggage storage and transport options. There are 2 multifunction rooms for events.

Guests can leave their car at the 24-hour parking (with extra costs). Cristal Porto Hotel is a 5-minute walk from Faria Guimarães Metro Station, and São Bento Train Station is 2 km away. Porto International Airport is 14 km.

name: Adega Floresta Residence
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Located in the centre of Porto, Adega Floresta Residence is a sustainable accommodation, which provides allergy-free rooms. The apartment, set in a building dating from 2021, is 600 metres from Palacio da Bolsa and 500 metres from Ferreira Borges Market. Featuring a private entrance, the apartment allows guests to maintain their privacy.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a coffee machine, a walk-in shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. With a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also provide guests with free WiFi. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Adega Floresta Residence include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Vila Gale Porto - Centro
description:
This 4-star, central Porto hotel is 300 metres from Campo 24 Agosto Metro Station. Vila Gale Porto offers a health club with an indoor swimming pool. The Rua de Santa Catarina commercial district is 10 minutes' walk.

The spacious rooms and suites at Vila Gale Porto are air-conditioned and feature a bright décor. All come with a flat-screen cable TV, minibar and a private bathroom, including a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Vila Gale Porto’s Paris – Texas Restaurant serves Portuguese cuisine and pasta. Room service is available 24/7, at an extra cost. Guests can enjoy wine from the hotel’s vineyard Casa de Santa Vitória, at one of the 2 bars. A billiards room is also on site.

Vila Gale’s Health Club features an indoor pool, sauna, hot tub, turkish bath, solarium, vichy shower, massage treatments and fitness centre with views over Porto city. WiFi is available in all areas of the hotel.

Central Aliados Avenue is 1.4 km away, while the Clérigos Tower 1.6 km away. Dom Luis I Bridge is 1.6 km away and is next to Ribeira and the Port Wine Cellars. Galerias de Paris, Porto's main bar area, are a 10-minute drive.

Campanhã Railway Station is 1 km away. The hotel is located 15 km from Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, and has direct access to Porto Metro system.

name: Hotel Jaguar Oporto - Airport to Hotel and City is a free Shuttle Service
description:
Located in Porto, 2 km from Oporto Coliseum, Hotel Jaguar Oporto - Airport to Hotel and City is a free Shuttle Service provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking and a bar. The property is around 2.5 km from FC Porto Museum, 2.7 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 2.8 km from Sao Bento Train Station. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at Hotel Jaguar Oporto - Airport to Hotel and City is a free Shuttle Service have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are equipped with a terrace. All rooms include a safety deposit box.

The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub.

Campanha Train Station is 2.9 km from Hotel Jaguar Oporto - Airport to Hotel and City is a free Shuttle Service, while Estadio do Dragao is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

name: Oca Republik Hotel
description:
Featuring a bar, Oca Republik Hotel is located in the centre of Porto, 1.2 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. The property is close to Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. All units include a wardrobe.

Speaking English, Spanish and Portuguese at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock.

Popular points of interest near Oca Republik Hotel include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Apartments Porto Historico
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 20m²
description:
Set in a renovated building which dates back to 1930, this unit is 700 metres from Porto’s central Aliados Avenue. The elegant Aparthotel Porto Historico is 550 metres from the iconic Clérigos Tower.

The property features accommodation in apartments, lofts and studios. All air-conditioned units feature a cable TV, free WiFi, dining table, private bathroom and a kitchenette. Linen and towels are provided.

Guests may cook their own meals in the equipped kitchenette at their disposal. Alternatively, the nearby Aliados has a wide range of traditional restaurants and typical Porto cafés. One of the city’s most famed dishes is the Francesinha.

The famous São Bento Train Station is 900 metres away and has Metro Station right next to it. The Ribeira area is 1.3 km away and overlooks the Douro River, while also housing several riverfront cafés and eateries. The Vila Nova de Gaia riverside is 1.9 km away and is where the Port Wine Cellars are sited. Porto International Airport is a 19-minute drive from the Aparthotel Porto Historico.

name: Panorama Apartments Porto Clerigos
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 40m²
description:
Panorama Apartments Porto Clerigos offers accommodation within 300 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. It is set 400 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and features private check-in and check-out. All rooms come with a balcony with city views.

At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Panorama Apartments Porto Clerigos, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Carris Porto Ribeira
description:
Situated in Porto’s Ribeira district, this 4-star hotel is situated in a refurbished, historic building overlooking the Douro River. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi. TV with international channels and private bathroom with free toiletries.

Wooden floors and a mix of dark and light colours are part of the modern décor.

A rich breakfast buffet is served every day and guests also have à la carte meals at their disposal, both in the Nomadik Lounge Bar and in the Forno Velho Restaurant.

The hotel has elevators, a business center, meeting rooms and a gym. It is strategically well communicated with the city: bus and taxi stops in front of the hotel, São Bento Station 600 meters away (train and metro) and Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport just 12 km away.

name: Downtown Colosseum Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 67m²
description:
Set in Porto, 200 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 400 metres from the centre, Downtown Colosseum Apartments offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Downtown Colosseum Apartments.

name: Apartment Boavista Roundabout by Sweet Porto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 45m²
description:
Located in Porto, Apartment Boavista Roundabout by Sweet Porto features accommodation with a flat-screen TV. Complimentary WiFi is provided.

All units are equipped with an oven, microwave, a coffee machine, a fridge and kettle. There is also a kitchen equipped with a stovetop.

Music House is 300 metres from the apartment, while Boavista Roundabout is 10 metres from the property. Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 13 km away.

name: Trindade Premium Suites & Apartments
description:
Enjoy Porto Guest House is located in Porto’s centre, just 300 metres away from Aliados Avenue. It has a shared living area.

Each elegant and air conditioned room includes a view and some also have a balcony. All rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. Most rooms feature a small kitchenette, which guests may use to cook simple meals. Free WiFi access is available.

Guests may visit the various restaurants that are available in the surrounding area. At a 5-minute walk are varied establishments serving Portuguese delicacies and the rich regional cuisine.

Trindade Metro Station is 550 metres away and connects with most of the Porto area. At a 10-minute walk are the Clérigos Tower, Lello Bookshop and the lively bars of Galerias de Paris. Historical São Bento Train Station is 800 metres from the units. Porto International Airport is 16 km away from the Enjoy Porto Guest House.

name: BessaHotel Baixa
description:
BessaHotel Baixa is centrally located in Porto, right in the heart of the undefeated city, just a few minutes from City Market Bolhão. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The air-conditioned luxurious rooms of BessaHotel are decorated in a modern style. All rooms have a work desk and a satellite/cable flat screen TV with Chromecast connectivity and video on demand. Some rooms have large terrace-style balconies with views of the city.

Featuring a 24-hour reception, BessaHotel provides a business centre and therapeutic massages upon request. The wellness area at BessaHotel Baixa is comprised of an indoor pool, a sauna and a fitness centre. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and laundry facilities.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include City Market Bolhao, Oporto Coliseum and Douro River. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 12 km from BessaHotel Baixa.

name: Axis Porto Club Aliados
description:
Ideally situated in the centre of Porto, Axis Porto Club Aliados features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms include a kettle, while selected rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature city views. All rooms have a wardrobe.

A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Popular points of interest near Axis Porto Club Aliados include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: MyStay Porto Bolhão
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 25m²
description:
MyStay Porto Bolhão is a restored historic building located in Porto centre. Oporto Coliseum is 200 metres away.

The contemporary accommodation is air conditioned and is equipped with a cable flat-screen TV and a refrigerator. Some rooms have a terrace and/or balcony with garden or city views and original details have been kept, such as the wooden ceilings. Each unit has a modern private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. Towels are provided.

There is also a kitchenette in some of the units, fitted with a microwave. Guests can use the fully equipped kitchenette to prepare their meals. The surrounding area is filled with restaurants and bars, 200 metres away.

MyStay Porto Bolhão can help guests with bicycle rentals to explore the city. Bolhão Market is located 300 metres away. A 24-hour shuttle service to Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, located 11 km away, is available at the reception.

name: Catarina Serviced Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 2 living rooms • 1 bathroom • 42m²
description:
Catarina Serviced Apartments features accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. The property has city and inner courtyard views, and is 700 metres from Oporto Coliseum. The accommodation offers a lift, full-day security and organising tours for guests.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is available for breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Catarina Serviced Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Oporto Street Sá de Noronha
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 60m²
description:
Offering modern air-conditioned accommodation in a 19th-century building, Oporto Street Sá de Noronha provides a tranquil setting in Porto, 100 metres from Paris Galleries Street and 300 metres from Clerigos Tower.

Some studios combine a sober décor with hardwood floors and stone walls. Each studio features a living area with sofa, a flat-screen cable TV, a dining table and a Bluetooth column. The private bathroom includes a shower, toiletries and a hair dryer. Some studios have a balcony.

The open-plan kitchen invites guests to prepare their meals here. For a hassle-free stay, a number of restaurants can be found within walking distance. City Market Bolhao is 700 metres from Oporto Street Sá de Noronha.

The iconic São Bento Train Station is 800 metres away and Trindade Metro Station is 10 minutes' walking and connects directly with Porto International Airport, 11 km from Oporto Street Sá de Noronha.

name: Charm Palace Porto
description_short: Private suite
description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Charm Palace Porto is situated in Porto, 400 metres from City Bolhão Market, Rua Santa Catarina and from Capela das Almas.

Rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower and bidet. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

There is luggage storage space at the property.

Café Majestic is 700 metres from Charm Palace Porto, while Douro River is 1.1 km away. Porto Airport is 11 km from the property.

name: HOMEinTOWN Camoes - Downtown Elegant Studio AC & WIFI
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Offering city views, HOMEinTOWN Camoes - Downtown Elegant Studio AC & WIFI is an accommodation set in Porto, 1.5 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 1.5 km from Oporto Coliseum. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is soundproof and is situated 1.5 km from Sao Bento Metro Station.

This air-conditioned apartment comes with a seating area, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a satellite flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Clerigos Tower is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Music House is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from HOMEinTOWN Camoes - Downtown Elegant Studio AC & WIFI.

name: GuestReady - House of Mompilher -A
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
GuestReady - House of Mompilher -A offers accommodation within 500 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. It is set 800 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and provides a lift. Music House is 2.5 km from the apartment and Boavista Roundabout is 1.8 km away.

The units in the apartment complex are fitted with a coffee machine. Some accommodation includes a terrace and a satellite TV equipped with cable channels, as well as air conditioning. All units feature a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from GuestReady - House of Mompilher -A.

name: Oporto Trendy Heritage
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Ideally situated in Porto, Oporto Trendy Heritage features express check-in and check-out and private parking. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Each unit is fitted with a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while some rooms are fitted with a terrace and some have garden views. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fruits, juice and cheese is available for breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available. For visitors looking to embark on day trips to nearby landmarks, the apartment provides a selection of packed lunches.

A car rental service is available at Oporto Trendy Heritage.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Oporto Coliseum, Sao Bento Metro Station and Sao Bento Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Oporto Trendy Heritage.

name: Tiara Downtown Apartments by DA'HOME
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Ideally set in Porto, Tiara Downtown Apartments by DA'HOME features a continental breakfast and free WiFi. This sustainable apartment is located 700 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 1.2 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. The apartment has family rooms.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a shower. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Campanha Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Tiara Downtown Apartments by DA'HOME, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Casa da Figueiroa
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 33m²
description:
Offering a garden and garden view, Casa da Figueiroa is situated in Porto, 1.1 km from Boavista Roundabout and 1.7 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. Boasting private check-in and check-out, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Music House is 1.3 km away.

Fitted with a patio, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a kettle. At the guest house, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from Casa da Figueiroa.

name: Selina Porto
description:
Situated within a 4-minute walk of Paris Galleries Street, Selina Porto in Porto is centrally located in Porto, just steps from Carlos Alberto Theatre. The famed Clérigos Church is at 500 metres, while the centenary Lello Bookshop is within a 5-minute walk.

The property features accommodation in private double or twin rooms, as well as in dormitory rooms. Some rooms feature access to shared bathroom facilities, while others have their own private bathroom.

A wide range of popular restaurants, bars and cafés is available within a short walk. The property features an in-house restaurant as well. Speaking English and Portuguese at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Soares dos Reis National Museum is a 7-minute walk away. City Market Bolhao is 800 metres from the hostel. Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 11 km from the property and is reachable via metro.

name: 4-Suites Batalha Residence & SIZE Flats Batalha
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 90m²
description:
Located in the centre of Porto, 4-Suites Batalha Residence & SIZE Flats Batalha is a sustainable accommodation, which provides soundproof rooms. It is set 400 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and features a lift. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dishwasher, a kettle, a bidet, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi, while selected rooms have a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from 4-Suites Batalha Residence & SIZE Flats Batalha.

name: Citybreak-apartments Bolhao
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set in Porto’s Santa Catarina Street, the city’s main commercial avenue, the apartments are 500 metres from the emblematic Café Majestic. The Bolhão Metro Station and the Market are a 3-minute walk from the Citybreak-apartments Bolhao.

All apartments have a living room with a sofa and flat-screen cable TV, free WiFi and bathroom with a hairdryer. The units come with an equipped kitchen and a balcony with a view.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the equipped kitchen at their disposal. The Aliados Avenue in central Porto is 700 metres away and features a wide range of restaurants, bars and shops. Galerias de Paris, Porto’s main bar area, are at a 15-minute walking distance.

The iconic Clérigos Tower is a 15-minute walk from the units. The historical São Bento Train Station is 1 km away. Dom Luis I Bridge connects with Vila Nova de Gaia and is a 9-minute drive. Porto International Airport is a 15-minute drive from Citybreak-apartments Bolhao.

name: Janelas de São Bento by Porto City Hosts
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
Right in the centre of Porto, set within a short distance of Sao Bento Metro Station and Sao Bento Train Station, Janelas de São Bento by Porto City Hosts offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Oporto Coliseum, Clerigos Tower, and D. Luis I Bridge. Campanha Train Station is 2.8 km away and Boavista Roundabout is 3.5 km from the apartment.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a balcony with quiet street views. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ribeira Square, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Janelas de São Bento by Porto City Hosts, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: L'Olivier 23 - 2 apartments in a recently renovated Guesthouse
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Set 1.7 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, L'Olivier 23 - 2 apartments in a recently renovated Guesthouse offers air-conditioned accommodation with a patio. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. Units come with a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while some rooms also feature a terrace and some have garden views. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Music House and Boavista Roundabout. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from L'Olivier 23 - 2 apartments in a recently renovated Guesthouse.

name: Camões Flat w/ AC & Balcony by LovelyStay
description:
Set in Porto, 1.5 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 1.4 km from Sao Bento Train Station, Camões Flat w/ AC & Balcony by LovelyStay offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property has city views and is 1.4 km from Clerigos Tower and 2 km from Music House. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Oporto Coliseum.

This apartment has 1 bedroom, a kitchenette with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Boavista Roundabout is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Palacio da Bolsa is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from Camões Flat w/ AC & Balcony by LovelyStay.

name: Eurostars Oporto
description:
Eurostars Oporto is a modern design hotel located 100 metres from Hospital São João Metro. The hotel offers a breakfast daily, contemporary rooms and free Wi-Fi in public areas.

All guest rooms at Eurostars Oporto have hardwood floors and flatscreen TVs. Each has a private balcony and a tiled en suite bathroom.

Guests can enjoy a glass of local Porto wine in the bar. Regional and international meals can be enjoyed in the privacy of the guest rooms. The 24-hour front desk can help with car and bicycle rental.

Matosinho Beach is only 8 km away, and Oporto’s Dragao Football Stadium just 3 km.

This Eurostars Hotel is conveniently located 10 minutes’ Metro journey from Porto’s historic centre. It is 10 minutes’ drive from Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport.

name: Bloom House by Sweet Porto
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 32m²
description:
Set 200 metres from City Market Bolhao in Porto, Bloom House by Sweet Porto features accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Some units feature a balcony and/or a patio with garden or city views.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Oporto Coliseum, Paris Galleries Street and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 11 km from the property.

name: Bruval Premium Apartments - Sé Porto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Set in Porto, 300 metres from Ribeira Square and 600 metres from the centre, Bruval Premium Apartments - Sé Porto offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a casino. This sustainable apartment is located 400 metres from Palacio da Bolsa and 200 metres from Ferreira Borges Market. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Guests can have wine or champagne and chocolates or cookies delivered to their room. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

A bar can be found on-site.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like hiking.

Popular points of interest near Bruval Premium Apartments - Sé Porto include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 17 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Three Magi Residence
description:
A sustainable property, Three Magi Residence is located in Porto near Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. It is situated 1.3 km from Palacio da Bolsa and provides a lift. The property is 600 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

The units at the guest house are equipped with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the guest house also offer free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony. At the guest house, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the guest house.

A car rental service is available at Three Magi Residence.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ferreira Borges Market, Ribeira Square and D. Luis I Bridge. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Three Magi Residence, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Touchy Porto
description:
Situated in Porto, 1.4 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 1.4 km from Sao Bento Train Station, Touchy Porto offers air conditioning. The property is close to Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.4 km from Oporto Coliseum.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment features a cable flat-screen TV and a kitchen with an oven and microwave. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Music House, Clerigos Tower and Boavista Roundabout. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Touchy Porto.

name: Torel Avantgarde
description_short: Private suite • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
Torel Avantgarde is set in Porto's centre, a 10-minute walk from the Douro riverside and 750 metres from the iconic Clérigos Church. The 3-time award-winning 5-star hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and a garden, as well as panoramic views over the city.

The rooms has air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. With a private bathroom, some rooms at the hotel also have a terrace. Guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Free WiFi is provided throughout.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at Torel Avantgarde. Guests can sample Portuguese and local dishes at the property's in-house restaurant.

This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Cristal Palace Gardens and the Lello Bookshop. Paris Galleries Street is a 10-minute walk from Torel Avantgarde, while Ferreira Borges Market is a 15-minute walk away. Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 18 km from the property.

name: Blau 1911
description:
Featuring a garden and views of city, Blau 1911 is a recently renovated bed and breakfast set in Porto, 500 metres from Music House. It is located 400 metres from Boavista Roundabout and offers luggage storage space. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace.

The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. The units are equipped with a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while certain rooms here will provide you with a balcony and some have garden views. At the bed and breakfast, the units have bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available every morning at the bed and breakfast.

Sao Bento Metro Station is 2.8 km from Blau 1911, while Sao Bento Train Station is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: BO - Almada
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 40m²
description:
BO - Almada is primely located in Porto’s centre, just 120 metres from Aliados Avenue and 500 metres from Clérigos Tower. The modern unit is situated in a traditional street.

The property features modern and bright accommodation in air-conditioned lofts and studios with a balcony. The living room and kitchen are open plan and have wooden floors. In the living area there are sofas, a flat-screen TV, DVD player, movies, dining table and iPod dock. The bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Guests are welcome to cook their own tasty meals in the equipped kitchen of their loft or studio. Alternatively, a variety of local restaurants is within a short 5-minute walk. The Porto cuisine is rich and features popular dishes like the famed Francesinha.

BO - Almada is within 500 metres from the centenary Lello Bookshop and the lively Galerias de Paris, one of the city’s trendiest nightlife areas. The iconic São Bento Train Station is 600 metres and also features a Metro Station. The Aliados Metro Station is just 220 metres away and connects with Porto International Airport, which is 15 km from the By Almada.

name: WOT Porto
description:
Just 5 minutes’ walk from Trindade Metro Station, WOT Porto offers air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms. It features a rooftop terrace overlooking the Igreja dos Clérigos Church.

All rooms have free WiFi and a satellite TV. They come equipped with a safety box and a hairdryer in the private en suite. Wake-up calls are offered on request.

A daily buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s breakfast room.

WOT Porto’s 24-hour reception desk offers a shuttle service and car rentals for navigating Porto’s surroundings. During evenings and on the weekend, free parking is available at a nearby location.

The art galleries on Miguel Bombarda Street are a 10-minute walk from the hotel. São Bento Railway Station, 500 metres away, offers easy access to other parts of Portugal.

name: The Editory Artist Baixa Porto Hotel
description:
Located in the heart of Porto, 100 metres from the Santa Catarina Street, The Editory Artist Baixa Porto Hotel  is a 5-star hotel with a confortable and contemporary ambience. It offers free WiFi in all areas.

The Editory Artist Baixa Porto Hotel features 17 spacious and modern air-conditioned rooms equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, safety deposit box and a minibar. Each room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer.

Functioning as a school-hotel for the students of the Porto School of Tourist, The Artist includes a restaurant with a varied menu, a bar and room service.

With 24-hour front desk, The Editory Artist Baixa Porto Hotel offers facilities like a business centre, a meeting room and laundry service. Major attractions of the city are within walking distance including the Clérigos Tower, the Lello Bookstore and the Bolhão Market.

The 24 de Agosto Metro Station is 450 metres away and the São Bento Train Station is 1.2 km away. Porto International Airport is 17 km away.

name: The Art Porto - Holiday Homes
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
Set within 200 metres of Oporto Coliseum and 700 metres of Sao Bento Metro Station in the centre of Porto, The Art Porto - Holiday Homes offers accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. The air-conditioned accommodation is 600 metres from Sao Bento Train Station. Featuring a private entrance, the apartment allows guests to maintain their privacy.

The units in the apartment complex are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The units are fitted with a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, while selected rooms here will provide you with a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a dishwasher. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from The Art Porto - Holiday Homes.

name: The Brewmaster's House
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 25m²
description:
Located next to the oldest brewpub in Porto, in a street full of bars and restaurants, The Brewmaster's House provides accommodation with free WiFi.

The air-conditioned studios and rooms include a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Most studios are equipped with a microwave, fridge, a coffee machine, a stovetop and kettle.

A craft beer is served as a complimentary welcome drink at check-in and tours to the brewery are available upon request.

Within walking distance from The Brewmaster's House, popular points of interest include City Market Bolhao, Clerigos Tower and Paris Galleries Street. Porto Airport is 11 km away.

name: Castelo Santa Catarina
description:
Set in a castle among landscaped gardens, Castelo Santa Catarina offers accommodation in central Porto and a breakfast featuring traditional Portuguese dishes. Marques Metro Station is 100 metres away.

Some of the property’s rooms boast early 20th Century decorations including ornate chest of drawers and large beds with carved headboards. Most rooms feature a private balcony, some overlooking the Mediterranean garden.

Guests can sunbath in the fold-up sun loungers in garden or explore the traditional glazed tiles in the courtyard. An aperitif or cold drink can be enjoyed iat the garden.

The staff at Santa Catarina Castle can assist with car rentals or arrange for pick-up and delivery of guest’s laundry. The 24-hour front desk can also organize in-room breakfast.

Castelo Santa Catarina is 1.5 km away from musical shows hosted at Coliseu do Porto Theatre. Porto historic centre is 850 metres away.

name: Tripas-Coração, Almada Charming City Center
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set in the centre of Porto, less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and a 9-minute walk from Sao Bento Train Station, Tripas-Coração, Almada Charming City Center offers free WiFi and air conditioning. This sustainable apartment is located 1 km from Oporto Coliseum and less than 1 km from Clerigos Tower. The apartment has private entrance.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Tripas-Coração, Almada Charming City Center, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Peninsular- Porto
description:
Hotel Peninsular- Porto occupies a prime location in the UNESCO heritage site of Porto old town, just 200 metres from Sao Bento railway station. The hotel has a restaurant, is 350 metres from the Clérigos Church and a 5-minute walk from the Lello Bookshop.

All rooms feature a private en suite bathroom. Hotel Peninsular- Porto’s bedrooms have a neutral, rustic décor and are equipped with antique wooden furniture. Some rooms also include a balcony and/or views.

Breakfast is served each morning in the downstairs restaurant, which is decorated in traditional Portuguese tiles. There are also many cafés and restaurants within a few minutes’ walk of the hotel.

The hotel staff can help you arrange tickets for the hop-on, hop-off bus tour of Porto. Hotel Peninsular- Porto is located just 3 minutes’ walk from the famous Rua de Santa Catarina shopping street.

São Bento Metro Station is just 3 minutes’ walk away. Hotel Peninsular- Porto is 17 km from Porto International Airport.

name: Apartment Bolhao Market by Sweet Porto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
Apartment Bolhao Market by Sweet Porto is a self-catering accommodation located in the centre of Porto just a few minutes’ walk from the Aliados Avenue and the Bolhão Market and metro station. Free WiFi access is available.

These studios include a double bedroom and a seating area equipped with a double sofa-bed and a flat-screen cable TV. The private bathroom has a shower.

Guests are welcome to prepare their own meals using the fully equipped kitchenette available. Alternatively guests can visit the various restaurants in the vicinity and taste traditional Porto delicacies and gastronomy.

If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Oporto Coliseum 400 metres away and the iconic Clérigos Tower a 10-minute walk away. Porto International Airport is located 16 km away.

name: GuestReady - São Brás Mezzanine
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Located in Porto, 1.9 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 1.9 km from Sao Bento Train Station, GuestReady - São Brás Mezzanine provides air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. The property is situated 2.5 km from Music House, 2.7 km from Clerigos Tower and 2.7 km from Boavista Roundabout. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.4 km from Oporto Coliseum.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like cycling.

FC Porto Museum is 2.9 km from GuestReady - São Brás Mezzanine, while Palacio da Bolsa is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Village Aparthotel By BOA
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Set in Porto, less than 1 km from Oporto Coliseum and 600 metres from the centre, Village Aparthotel By BOA offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a garden. This recently renovated aparthotel is located less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and a 9-minute walk from Sao Bento Train Station. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

The aparthotel provides guests with a patio, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Continental and vegetarian breakfast options with fruits, juice and cheese are available every morning at the aparthotel. A minimarket is available at the aparthotel.

The aparthotel has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near Village Aparthotel By BOA include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Old Street Homes
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
Old Street Homes provides accommodation within 600 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. This sustainable apartment is located less than 1 km from Oporto Coliseum and a 10-minute walk from Sao Bento Metro Station. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

At the apartment complex, the units are equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Some units include a terrace and/or a patio with inner courtyard views and an outdoor dining area. At the apartment complex, units include a seating area.

Babysitting service is also available for guests at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Old Street Homes include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Santo António Loft - Porto Perfect
description:
Santo António Loft - Porto Perfect is set in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, 1.4 km from Palacio da Bolsa, 1.5 km from Ferreira Borges Market and 1.7 km from Ribeira Square. The property is situated 1.5 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, 1.6 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 2.3 km from Oporto Coliseum. The property is 1.1 km from Clerigos Tower, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Music House is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Boavista Roundabout is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Santo António Loft - Porto Perfect.

name: Blissful Suites Porto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 47m²
description:
1.6 km from FC Porto Museum, Blissful Suites Porto is a sustainable property situated in Porto and features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. It is set 1.6 km from Estadio do Dragao and offers a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surrounding area.

Campanha Train Station is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Oporto Coliseum is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Blissful Suites Porto.

name: Bonfim 234 Townhouse
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Located in a refurbished building from the 50's, Bonfim 234 Townhouse is set in Porto, 10 minutes' walking from Santa Catarina Street and 800 metres from City Market Bolhao. Free WiFi is provided.

The apartments combine modern equipment with retro-style furnishings. They all include a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a seating area to relax in while listening to a borrowed vinyl disc. Some apartments offer views of the interior garden.

All apartments have an equipped kitchen and a dining area. The area has some of the best restaurants for the traditional Francesinha and supermarkets.

Aliados Avenue is 15 minutes’ walking. Douro River is 1.4 km from Bonfim 234 Townhouse, while D. Luis I Bridge is 1.5 km away.

24 de Agosto Metro Station is 200 metres from 234 Townhouse, and Campanhã Train Station is a 12-minute walk. Porto Airport is 17 km away.

name: Torel 1884 Suites & Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 40m²
description:
Set in the centre of Porto, Torel 1884 Suites & Apartments is a sustainable accommodation, which offers allergy-free rooms. The property has inner courtyard views and is 300 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and 300 metres from Sao Bento Train Station. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests.

All units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a walk-in shower, bathrobes and a wardrobe. Units come with a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while some rooms also feature a patio and some have city views. At the guest house, the units have bed linen and towels.

Guests may eat in the on-site family-friendly restaurant, which is open for dinner, lunch, cocktails and high tea.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property. A car rental service is available at the guest house.
