Attractively situated in the centre of Porto, GRANDE HOTEL PARIS by STAY HOTELS features air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

At the hotel, rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms are equipped with a kettle, while certain rooms have a balcony and others also boast city views. The rooms have a wardrobe.

Guests at GRANDE HOTEL PARIS by STAY HOTELS can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Popular points of interest near GRANDE HOTEL PARIS by STAY HOTELS include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the hotel.

name: Clérigos Prime Suites by Porto City Hosts
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Featuring city views, Clérigos Prime Suites by Porto City Hosts is situated in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, 800 metres from Ferreira Borges Market and 200m from Lello Bookshop.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a TV and a private bathroom with bath, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a fridge and oven are also available, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include D. Luis I Bridge, Palacio da Bolsa and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Clérigos Prime Suites by Porto City, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: YOUROPO - Bolhao
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Set in Porto, Your Opo Bolhao Apartments is across from the historic and emblematic Bolhão market. Santa Catarina Street, Porto's main commercial street, is a short 3-minute walk away and has many shops, boutiques and eateries.

The uniquely-decorated apartments feature a flat-screen TV in the living area, along with a sofa. There is also a full kitchen, fitted with an oven and microwave, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Each unit comes with a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the equipped kitchen or kitchenette at their disposal, The vibrant bar and restaurant area of Paris Galleries Street is 700 metres from Your Opo Bolhao Apartments.

The Bolhão Metro Station is 100 metres away, featuring connections with most of the city's famous areas. Clérigos Church is 800 metres away, while the historic São Bento Train Station is 550 metres away. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 18 km from Your Opo Bolhao Apartments.

name: LÓIOS 74 by DA'HOME
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 25m²
description:
Attractively located in Porto, LÓIOS 74 by DA'HOME features a continental breakfast and free WiFi. This recently renovated apartment is located 200 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and 200 metres from Sao Bento Train Station. Guests can enjoy city views.

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchenette with a fridge, a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. The apartment complex offers some units that have a balcony, and the units have a coffee machine. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ribeira Square, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from LÓIOS 74 by DA'HOME, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Portofoz
description:
Located on the Foz do Douro district, only a stone’s throw from the Atlantic Ocean, this guest house offers guests cosy accommodation with sea views.

Combining rustic décor with friendly service, Residencial Portofoz makes the most of its central location. Marvel at sea views while enjoying breakfast in bed. If you wish, you can also surf the internet in the comfort of your room.

The attentive staff is at your service 24 hours per day and happy to direct you to the parking lot nearby.  The staff can also help you to organise your journey through Caminho de Santiago de Compostela.

 After a long day of travelling or sightseeing, the bar is the perfect spot to have a refreshing drink and meet other guests.

name: Rua de Trás Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
situated in Porto's historic centre, Rua de Trás Apartments is 130 metres from the Clérigos Church.

 All rooms include a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine. one of the rooms feature a balcony with a view.

Popular points of interest near Rua de Trás Apartments are Paris Galleries Street, Lello Bookshop is 230 metres away. The historic São Bento Train Station is at 500 metres. Porto's Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is 15 km from the property and is reachable by metro.

name: Santa Catarina Porto Housing
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Santa Catarina Porto Housing provides accommodation within 400 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a fridge and a stovetop. With city views, this accommodation offers a balcony. The apartment features family rooms.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms here will provide you with a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Oporto Coliseum, Sao Bento Metro Station and Sao Bento Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Santa Catarina Porto Housing.

name: Primrose 0.3 - 1BR Porto Delight by LovelyStay
description:
In the centre of Porto, located within a short distance of Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa, Primrose 0.3 - 1BR Porto Delight by LovelyStay offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. With inner courtyard views, this accommodation provides a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Music House.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 2 bathrooms equipped with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ferreira Borges Market, Boavista Roundabout and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 13 km from Primrose 0.3 - 1BR Porto Delight by LovelyStay.

name: Oporto Bonjardim Residence
description:
Oporto Bonjardim Residence is set in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, 1 km from Sao Bento Train Station, 1.1 km from Oporto Coliseum and 1.3 km from Clerigos Tower. It is situated 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and features a lift. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Each unit has a private bathroom, while some rooms have a balcony and others also boast a city view. At the guest house, some units are fitted with a kettle and wine or champagne.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Oporto Bonjardim Residence.

name: OHH- Caligrafia Vintage Apartment
description:
OHH- Caligrafia Vintage Apartment is set in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, 1 km from Sao Bento Train Station, 1.3 km from Oporto Coliseum and 2.5 km from Music House. The property is close to Ferreira Borges Market, Ribeira Square and D. Luis I Bridge. The property is 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Clerigos Tower, Boavista Roundabout and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from OHH- Caligrafia Vintage Apartment.

name: Hospes Infante Sagres Porto
description:
This historic 5-star hotel, a member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World, is located in central Porto, a 4-minute walk from Aliados Metro Station. Renovated in early 2018, the hotel has antique chandeliers in its public areas and also features the newly-opened Scarlett Brasserie & Wine Bar.

The soundproofed rooms and suites of the Hotel Infante De Sagres feature custom-made furnishings. The classical décor comes together with satellite flat-screen TVs and air conditioning.

A wide range of popular restaurants and eateries is available within a short walk from the property. Just 200 metres away are Galerias de Paris, a hip area which has a range of popular bars, shops and restaurants.

The historic property also features a sundeck, with a plunge pool and sun loungers.

Situated in Porto’s UNESCO Heritage city centre, Infante De Sagres is a 10-minute walk from the Cathedral and a 10-minute drive from Rem Koolhaas's Casa da Mùsica Concert Hall. At a 14-minute walk is the top of the iconic Dom Luís I Bridge, which provides scenic views over the Douro River and the city. A shuttle can be arranged for Francisco de Sá Carneiro Airport, which is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Serviced Apartments Boavista Palace
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 56m²
description:
This apartment complex in Porto is in the city’s business district, near Carolina Michaëlis Metro Station. It offers a terrace, a gym and apartments with a flat-screen TV. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The chic, contemporary apartments at Serviced Apartments Boavista Palace lead onto balconies. In the living room, guests can enjoy some cable TV on the plasma TV.

Meals prepared in the fully equipped kitchens can be served in the dining area. Modern bathrooms have under-floor heating.

The Apartments also offers a spacious terrace where guests can relax with drinks. A gym featuring modern equipment is also available.

Serviced Apartments Boavista Palace is just a 10-minute walk from the Praça Mouzinho de Albuquerque.

name: Douro Virtudes Apartments Historical Center
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 40m²
description:
Featuring garden views, Douro Virtudes Apartments Historical Center offers accommodation with patio, around 500 metres from Clerigos Tower. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The property is 800 metres from the city centre and 400 metres from Palacio da Bolsa.

The units come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, microwave, a kettle, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Each unit comes with a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while some rooms come with a terrace and some have river views. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the apartment. Dining options are available close to the apartment.

A car rental service is available at Douro Virtudes Apartments Historical Center, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ferreira Borges Market, Ribeira Square and Sao Bento Metro Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Douro Virtudes Apartments Historical Center, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Downtown Historic Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
Located in a central area of Porto, 400 metres from Oporto Coliseum and less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, Downtown Historic Apartments provides air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. The property features garden and city views, and is less than 1 km from Sao Bento Train Station. Guests can access the apartment via private entrance.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchenette, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Clerigos Tower, Campanha Train Station and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Downtown Historic Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Casa dos Lóios by Shiadu
description:
Casa dos Lóios by Shiadu offers classy accommodation, with modern touches, in the heart of Porto. The property is a 5-minute walk from the Porto city centre and a 3-minute drive away from the iconic D. Luís I Bridge.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Casa dos Lóios by Shiadu feature a private bathroom with free toiletries, flat-screen cable or satellite TV, free WiFi access and a safe.

A breakfast buffet is served each morning in the guest house. It is a 5-minute walk to the Aliados in the Porto city centre, with many bars, restaurants, cafés and shops. The local specialties include the Francesinha: a typical dish made up of meats, bread, cheese and a rich sauce.

The house has a cosy patio area, where guests guests are welcome to relax and take a break.

Casa dos Lóios by Shiadu is an 8-minute walk from Batalha and Santa Catarina Street, Porto’s main commercial avenue. It is a 4-minute walk to the São Bento train station and its distinctive tiled panels with historical themes. Clérigos Tower is a 4-minute walk and the the Galerias Paris nightlife hotspot is a 5-minute walk away, with its many bars, cafés and lively atmosphere.

The Porto International Airport is a 20-minute drive away and the Casa dos Lóios by Shiadu has a shuttle service available, at a surcharge.

name: Feel Porto Firmeza Coworking & Flats
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 41m²
description:
Feel Porto Firmeza Coworking & Flats features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Porto, 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, 1.1 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 1.4 km from Clerigos Tower. This sustainable apartment is located 1.9 km from Palacio da Bolsa and 1.7 km from Ferreira Borges Market. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 700 metres from Oporto Coliseum.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. Every unit includes a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms are equipped with a terrace and some have city views. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fruits and juice is served for the continental breakfast.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surroundings.

Campanha Train Station is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Ribeira Square is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Feel Porto Firmeza Coworking & Flats, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Porto A.S. 1829 Hotel
description:
Located in a fully-renovated historical building, the Porto AS 1829 Hotel is located in the city’s historical centre. Noted Porto landmarks like the Clérigos Tower and São Bento Train Station are a 7-minute walk.

The Hotel has ample rooms, all with a private bathroom and some including a classic bathtub in the room. The rooms include a view, with some having scenic Porto views. Each air-conditioned unit also has a flat-screen TV. Free WiFi access is available.

Guests can indulge in traditional Portuguese dishes served with a contemporary twist, at the Galeria do Largo Restaurant, the on-site restaurant.

The iconic Dom Luis I Bridge is just 550 metres away and its upper deck can be crossed either on foot or via Metro. The Porto Cathedral is 400 metres away. The riverfront Ribeira area is 300 metres away and features various waterfront eateries and a view to Vila Nova de Gaia. Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 22 km from the Porto AS 1829 Hotel.

name: Firmeza388 Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
Set in a central area of Porto, 600 metres from Oporto Coliseum and less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, Firmeza388 Apartments offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The apartment, set in a building dating from 1957, is 1.6 km from Ferreira Borges Market and 2.5 km from Campanha Train Station. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit comes with a terrace, a fully equipped kitchen with a toaster, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Firmeza388 Apartments.

name: GuestReady - Over the Bridge
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 60m²
description:
In the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, close to Sao Bento Train Station, GuestReady - Over the Bridge features free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is located 800 metres from Oporto Coliseum, 600 metres from Clerigos Tower and 2.8 km from Campanha Train Station. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 200 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like cycling.

Popular points of interest near GuestReady - Over the Bridge include Ribeira Square, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: My Story Apartments Porto - Santa Catarina
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 45m²
description:
Located within 200 metres of Oporto Coliseum and 600 metres of Sao Bento Metro Station in the centre of Porto, My Story Apartments Porto - Santa Catarina provides accommodation with free WiFi and a kitchenette. This sustainable apartment is located 500 metres from Sao Bento Train Station and 1.9 km from Campanha Train Station. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a kettle, a microwave, a stovetop, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At the apartment complex, all units are soundproof. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Clerigos Tower, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from My Story Apartments Porto - Santa Catarina.

name: Mártires Sweet Apts by PortoCityHosts
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
Mártires Sweet Apts by PortoCityHosts is situated in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, less than 1 km from Sao Bento Train Station, a 15-minute walk from Oporto Coliseum and 2.2 km from Music House. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Ferreira Borges Market, Ribeira Square, and D. Luis I Bridge. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station.

Featuring a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms have a terrace. At the apartment complex, every unit is fitted with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Clerigos Tower, Boavista Roundabout and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Mártires Sweet Apts by PortoCityHosts, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Vincci Porto
description:
With its avant garde feel and furnishings, Vincci Porto is a stylish 4-star hotel in a renovated landmark building know as Bolsa do Pescado. Located in Porto's riverfront, the hotel is 5 minutes' walking from the Cristal Palace Gardens.

Each of the elegant rooms features a TV, air conditioning and a minibar. The large bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. The units also feature a desk and a laptop safe. Free WiFi access is available and the hotel provides a 24-hour front desk service.

Breakfast is available and served each morning at the property. The Vincci’s restaurant serves traditional Portuguese meals and international dishes.Guests may also wish to pay a visit to the Porto centre, which features a wide variety of restaurants, many of which serving the famed Francesinha dish. The terrace offers panoramic views of the Arrábida Bridge and is open from April to October, subject the weather conditions.

The Serralves Modern Art Museum and its lush green gardens are at a 4.8 km distance. Within 4.4 km is the Arrábida Bridge, which connects with Vila Nova de Gaia, site of the Port Wine Cellars. The Porto centre features renowned landmarks such as the Clérigos Tower and the São Bento Train Station. Porto International Airport is a 17-minute drive from the Vincci Porto.

name: Casa do Cristelo
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 66m²
description:
Set in Porto, 1.5 km from Clerigos Tower and 1.4 km from Palacio da Bolsa, Casa do Cristelo offers accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. The property is around 1.9 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, 1.9 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 3 km from Oporto Coliseum. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Ferreira Borges Market.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property offers quiet street views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ribeira Square, Music House and Boavista Roundabout. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Casa do Cristelo.

name: Traça Apartments by DA'HOME
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 18m²
description:
Traça Apartments by DA'HOME offers accommodation within 600 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. The air-conditioned accommodation is 500 metres from Ribeira Square. The apartment has family rooms.

At the apartment complex, units are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The apartment complex provides some units that feature a balcony, and every unit has a coffee machine. Additional in-room amenities include chocolates or cookies.

A continental breakfast, comprising fruits and juice is served every morning at the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Sao Bento Metro Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Traça Apartments by DA'HOME, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Porto Stadium Quality Studio w/ garage spot
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 37m²
description:
In a prime location in the Campanhã district of Porto, Porto Stadium Quality Studio w/ garage spot is a sustainable apartment located 700 metres from Estadio do Dragao and 3.8 km from Campanha Train Station. The property invites guests to reconnect with nature and encourages them to make eco-friendly travel choices. The air-conditioned accommodation is 800 metres from FC Porto Museum, and guests can benefit from complimentary WiFi and private parking available on site. The accommodation provides a lift and full-day security for guests.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a balcony with mountain views. Guests can enjoy a meal on an outdoor dining area while overlooking the city views. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Oporto Coliseum is 4.1 km from the apartment, while Sao Bento Metro Station is 4.8 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from Porto Stadium Quality Studio w/ garage spot, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Pestana Apartments - Premium
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Situated 1.4 km from FC Porto Museum, Pestana Apartments - Premium offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also boast free WiFi. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

If you would like to discover the area, cycling, fishing and hiking are possible in the surroundings and the apartment can arrange a car rental service.

Popular points of interest near Pestana Apartments - Premium include Campanha Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Estadio do Dragao. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Miragaia - Riverside Suites - Adults Only
description:
Located 500 metres from the N14 Circunvalaçao Road and 12 minutes' drive from Porto Airport, Star Inn Porto is the city’s first low-cost design hotel. It combines modern accommodation, stylish décor throughout and free internet access.

Featuring a contemporary outlook, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Star Inn Porto are equipped with flat-screen TVs and a work desk. Each includes en suite bathrooms with power shower.

Area Cafe serves a range of drinks and light snacks. Renowned Portuguese wines and some local spirits are offered at The Star Inn Lounge bar.

Guests with a car can leave their car parked for free at Star Inn Porto and take the metro or bus and enjoy a hassle-free walk through Porto centre.

Nearby landmarks include Porto University and Hospital de São João.

name: YOUROPO - The Tower
description:
Located 700 metres from Palacio da Bolsa in Porto, Miragaia - Riverside Suites - Adults Only provides accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi.

The bed and breakfast offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, free toiletries and shower.

Continental breakfast is available daily in a breakfast box at Miragaia - Riverside Suites - Adults Only.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Clerigos Tower, Lello Bookshop and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 11 km from Miragaia - Riverside Suites - Adults Only, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Guest House Estrela
description:
Centrally located in Porto, this charming hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a rich breakfast prepared with local ingredients. Free WiFi is available in all areas.

The rooms at Hotel Mira D'Aire are decorated with dark wooden furnishings and are fully air conditioned. They include a tea/coffee maker, a work desk and a private bathroom.

A breakfast buffet is served daily at the hotel. The friendly staff at Mira D'Aire can offer advice on local activities. After a day of exploring the area, guests can enjoy a refreshing drink at the bar.

Bicycle rental and laundry services are among the convenient facilities offered by the Hotel Mira. Lapa Metro Station is located just a few minutes’ walk from the hotel.

name: In Porto Gallery Guesthouse
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Situated in the centre of Porto, just 400 metres from Palacio da Bolsa and 400 metres from Ferreira Borges Market, Olival 54 Apartments features accommodation with river views and free WiFi. The property has city views and is 500 metres from Clerigos Tower and 600 metres from Ribeira Square. This 5-star apartment offers private entrance.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Olival 54 Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Trindade Apartments
description:
Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, Oporto Serviced Apartments bbgourmet is set in Porto, 800 metres from Paris Galleries Street. Clerigos Tower is 900 metres away. Private parking is available on site.

All units have a seating and dining area. A dishwasher and kettle are also featured. All units also have a kitchen or a kitchenette, fitted with an oven, a microwave, and a toaster. Bed linen is available.

Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, with packed lunches available on request.

City Market Bolhao is 1 km from Oporto Serviced Apartments bbgourmet, while Boavista Roundabout is 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 10 km from the property.

name: Star Inn Porto
description:
In Porto Gallery Guesthouse is located in the centre of Porto just a few metres from the Aliados Avenue. Featuring free WiFi, this property is set in a completely renovated historical building.

Inspired in art and romanticism, each room is individually decorated and comes with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a desk, a kettle and a minibar. Private bathrooms come with a bath or a shower, a hairdryer and free amenities. Daily cleaning.

Every morning, a continental breakfast is served, and guests may enjoy it in the garden or in the covered deck. In the surrounding area guests will find plenty of eateries serving traditional Porto delicacies and dishes.

The Bolhão Market is just a 3-minute walk from the In Porto Gallery Guesthouse and the iconic Clérigos Tower is 700 metres away. The UNESCO World Heritage site Ribeira is 1 km away and across the Douro River guests can taste some of the finest Port wines at their original cellars.

In Porto Guesthouse is a 3-minute walk from the Aliados Metro Station, a 7-minute walk from the São Bento Train Station and 17 km from the Porto International Airport.

name: Pinheiro Terrace Downtown Apartment by DA'HOME
description_short: Private suite • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 48m²
description:
Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, a garden as well as a terrace, Saboaria is set in the centre of Porto, 800 metres from Oporto Coliseum. The property is close to Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms include a coffee machine, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and others also have city views. At Saboaria all rooms have bed linen and towels.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the full kitchen at their disposal. Alternatively, various typical restaurants and eateries are available nearby, many within a short 5-minute walk in Ribeira, a UNESCO World Heritage site.

The Clérigos Tower is a 10-minute walk away, while Galerias de Paris, with its many lively bars, are at a 15-minute walk. Aliados Avenue and the São Bento Train Station are within a 10-minute walk. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 22 km from the property.

The completely renovated hotel welcomes you in a modern and warm atmosphere. While enjoying the view of the city from the hotel's 'La Bicicleta' restaurant, you can sample regional Portuguese cuisine. You can also have a drink or snack in the cozy setting of the hotel bar or on our rooftop.

For your comfort, the modern rooms of the hotel with a view of Porto are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar.
The bathroom also has a relaxing bathtub and a hairdryer.

For your business trips, the hotel has a free Wi-Fi connection and 4 meeting rooms equipped for your professional events and seminars.

The Mercure Porto Centro is suitable both for families thanks to its spacious suites and attention for children, but also for couples and business travelers who can enjoy the calm and the ideal location for the hotel to visit the city.

Ideally located, the Mercure Porto Centro Santa Catarina is near the São Bento train station, which is only a 7-minute walk away, but also many tourist attractions: Casa da Música, Torre dos Clérigos, and the famous Café Majestic.

The famous Torre dos Clérigos bell tower and the romantic Ribeira district with its many cafés can be reached in less than 10 minutes on foot.

Guests can relax on a sun lounger next to the hotel's infinity pool which overlooks the river. The spa has a Turkish bath, heated indoor pool and a sauna. Massage treatments are also available.

The restaurant at Pestana Palácio do Freixo serves a daily buffet breakfast cooked with fresh ingredients. Guests can order light snacks at the pool or evening cocktails at the hotel’s bar.

The hotel is situated 1 km from Campanhã Train Station. Porto Airport is a 20-minute drive away and free parking is available.  Pestana Palácio do Freixo offers free transfer to the city centre.

At the bed and breakfast, each unit is fitted with a desk. Featuring a shared bathroom, units at the bed and breakfast also provide guests with free WiFi, while selected rooms include a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, all units have bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the bed and breakfast. Dining options are available close to the bed and breakfast.

Popular points of interest near BREINER 28 include Ferreira Borges Market, Boavista Roundabout and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

The hotel has a varied breakfast buffet available every morning. Within walking distance guests will find a variety of restaurants as well as the Norteshopping shopping centre with its various stores and eateries. The Sete Bicas Metro Station is a 5-minute walk, connecting guests to the centre of Porto.

Porto Norte Moov Hotel features a 24-hour reception, private parking and daily cleaning. It is 10 km from Porto International Airport, 5 km from Exponor and just 200 metres from Porto Business School.

Combining a central location in Porto with an historical building, a patio and modern rooms, the Decating Porto House is 2 minutes’ walking from Bolhão Metro Station. Wine tours, city tours and wine tastings, all tailored to each guest, can be organized, upon request.

This wine-themed hotel has 4 floors features air-conditioned rooms with a clean décor, wooden floors, a flat-screen cable TV and an armchair. Each headboard has wooden boards recycled from wine crates. The private bathroom comes with a shower and a hairdryer on request. Free WiFi is available. The unit has a traditional staircase with a skylight.

A continental breakfast is available every morning and can be served indoors or on the decked area facing the patio, weather permitting. Breakfast includes a variety of homemade products, made with local ingredients. The central location of the Decating Porto House allows guests to easily explore Porto cuisine in any of the surrounding options.

Santa Catarina shopping street is a few steps away, and the iconic Torre dos Clérigos is 15 minutes’ walking. The historical Majestic Café is 500 metres from the Porto House.

Porto International Airport is within a 50-minute metro ride from Trindade Metro Station, located less than 10 minutes’ walking. Decanting Porto House also provides an airport shuttle service upon request and at a surcharge.

All apartments and studios come with a living area, featuring sofas, a flat-screen cable TV and a DVD player. There is an equipped kitchenette and all feature a private bathroom with quality toiletries.

Guests are welcome to cook their own meals in the equipped kitchenettes, enjoying them in the bright dining areas. The nearby Porto centre has various traditional restaurants within a 5-minute walk. The area is renowned for its wines and for dishes such as the traditional Francesinha.

Private parking is available, upon request and at an extra cost. Bicycle rental is possible with the front desk, for those wishing to tour the city in an alternate fashion.

The renowned Clérigos Tower is 1.3 km away, as are the popular and lively Galerias de Paris, with its many bars and cafés. The historical São Bento Train Station is 1.1 km away from the apartments. The nearest Metro Station is within 500 metres and the Trendy Apartments are 19 km from Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport.

Gourmet meals with ingredients from the property's organic produce are served on the ground-floor living area, or in the gardens. Coffee, snacks and light meals are also available throughout the day.

Car and bicycle rentals are on offer, in order to explore Porto. Rosa Et Al Townhouse's concierge can take care of restaurant and museum reservations.

Located in Porto Coliseum building, the recently refurbished Porto Coliseum Hotel offers modern themed rooms and a rooftop terrace bar, a few steps from Santa Catarina Street. Free WiFi is included.

Rooms evoke memories from past shows combined with an elegant and contemporary décor. Rooms include air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and a minibar. Some have a seating area.

Breakfast is served daily in the rooftop breakfast room and includes fresh fruit, croissants, eggs and cereals. When the day is sunny, breakfast can be enjoyed outdoors, while gazing at the city. The Lounge Bar Coliseum offers stunning views over the city and provides a nice setting for a sunset drink.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can help guests with local tips and shuttle services. The iconic Bolhão Market is 350 metres away from Porto Coliseum Hotel. Aliados Avenue and Clérigos Tower are within a 10-minute walk.

The closest metro station is Bolhão, located within a 5-minute walk. Porto International Airport is around 18 km from the hotel.

At the bed and breakfast, units are fitted with a wardrobe. All units are equipped with a private bathroom, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace and some have garden views. At the bed and breakfast, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fresh pastries, fruits and juice are available daily at the bed and breakfast. At Vila Camélia, the family-friendly restaurant is open for dinner and lunch and serves French cuisine.

The bed and breakfast has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Boavista Roundabout is 2.8 km from the accommodation, while Oporto Coliseum is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from Vila Camélia.

Featuring free WiFi access, the comfortable apartments have either one or two bedrooms. Each has a comfortable living area, with dining table, sofas and a flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom and a modern kitchen. The units feature views over the city.

Guests can cook their own meals in the kitchen at their disposal. Alternatively, various quality restaurants serving traditional specialities are available within a 5-minute walk.

The top level of the famed São Luís I Bridge is a 6-minute walk and features stunning views over the Douro River, Porto and Vila Nova de Gaia. The Clérigos Church is 600 metres away, as are the lively bars of Galerias de Paris. Porto Airport is located 19 km from the property.

Every one of the 56 modern and elegant rooms at this hotel is air conditioned and fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, minibar, safe, work desk and free WiFi access. All rooms come with a private bathroom which includes a hairdryer . Superior rooms also come with a bathtub and a coffee machine.

Room breakfast is available, at an extra fee. Alternatively, those wishing to try out the local gastronomy can visit one of the many Porto restaurants available within a short 5-minute walk.

The Porto Coliseum is 300 metres away from the hotel. The iconic Clérigos Tower is at a 10-minute walk, as are the lively bars and restaurants of Galerias de Paris. 650 metres away is São Bento Train Station. Dom Luis I Bridge is a 10-minute walk and connects with the site of the Port Wine Cellars. Premium Porto Downtown is 18 km from Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport. A shuttle service from the airport is provided, upon previous request and at an extra fee.

name: GuestReady - Cosy and Modern Apartment 4mins from Metro
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set in Porto, GuestReady - Cosy and Modern Apartment 4mins from Metro offers city views and free WiFi, 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and less than 1 km from Sao Bento Train Station. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.8 km from Palacio da Bolsa, 1.6 km from Ferreira Borges Market and 1.3 km from D. Luis I Bridge. The property is 500 metres from Oporto Coliseum, and within 700 metres of the city centre.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like cycling.

Popular points of interest near GuestReady - Cosy and Modern Apartment 4mins from Metro include Campanha Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Nomad's Formosa - Apartments Porto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
Nomad's Formosa - Apartments Porto is a recently renovated apartment in the centre of Porto, 400 metres from Oporto Coliseum and less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. The air-conditioned accommodation is less than 1 km from Sao Bento Train Station. The property is close to popular attractions like Ferreira Borges Market, Ribeira Square and D. Luis I Bridge.

The units in the apartment complex are equipped with a TV with satellite channels. Every unit includes a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms are equipped with a balcony and some have city views. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Campanha Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from Nomad's Formosa - Apartments Porto.

name: RIBEIRA FLORES 59 Downtown Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 46m²
description:
Well situated in Porto, RIBEIRA FLORES 59 Downtown Apartments offers a continental breakfast and free WiFi. This recently renovated apartment is located 400 metres from Clerigos Tower and 500 metres from Palacio da Bolsa. The apartment features family rooms.

At the apartment complex, the units come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ferreira Borges Market, Sao Bento Metro Station and Sao Bento Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 17 km from RIBEIRA FLORES 59 Downtown Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Casa da Belavista
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 60m²
description:
Casa da Bela Vista is located in a beautifully restored 18th century house on the banks of Douro River estuary. It sits in Foz Velha, 5 km from Porto’s city centre.

Belavista’s apartments feature Indo-Portuguese furniture and tiled floors. The warm living room includes cable TV. The dining area comes with a fully equipped kitchenette. Free Wi-Fi access is included.

Guests can prepare meals in their self-catering apartment. Matosinhos, located 5 km away through the Atlantic coast, has a variety of seafood and fish restaurants. The surrounding quaint pebbled streets offer plenty of dining options.

An old tram leaves from the area next to Casa da Belavista to Ribeira district, along the river bank, providing unforgettable views. Passeio do Alegre Garden is about 100 metres away, offering Douro River and Atlantic Ocean views. Guests can enjoy golf or a tennis match a few metres away.

The 16th-century Renaissance São Miguel-O-Anjo Lighthouse is 1 minute walk away. Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is a 16-minute drive away, and Casa da Belavista offers a shuttle service.

name: Grande Hotel do Porto
description:
Within Porto's central pedestrian zone, this hotel is in a renovated 1880 building, at a 5-minute walk from the São Bento Train Station. It has a rooftop terrace and an à la carte restaurant serving Portuguese cuisine.

The elegant rooms at the Grande Hotel do Porto include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bath tub and shower.

With a romantic atmosphere, D. Pedro II Restaurant is located in a restored ballroom. It serves authentic Portuguese cuisine prepared with local ingredients and with some vegetables grown in the rooftop vegetable garden. Drinks can be enjoyed at the Windsor Bar. The property's rooftop terrace features scenic 360º views over Porto's historic centre and its colourful rooftops

Guests can admire panoramic Porto views from the terrace, train in the 24-hour fitness room or relax with a massage.

Convenient facilities at the Grande Hotel do Porto include laundry services, babysitting services and currency exchange.

Grande Hotel do Porto is steps from Bolhão Bus and Metro Station and 10 minutes from the Serra do Pilar Monastery by foot. The Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 15 km from the hotel.

name: GuestReady - Portrait with a view
description:
Set in Porto, 1.4 km from Palacio da Bolsa, GuestReady - Portrait with a view offers accommodation with a terrace, free WiFi and a lift. The property is around 1.6 km from Boavista Roundabout, 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 1 km from Sao Bento Train Station. The property is 800 metres from Clerigos Tower, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

This apartment has 1 bedroom, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ferreira Borges Market, Ribeira Square and Music House. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from GuestReady - Portrait with a view.

name: Oporto Chic & Cozy - Anibal Cunha
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
A sustainable property, Oporto Chic & Cozy - Anibal Cunha is located in Porto near Music House, Boavista Roundabout and Clerigos Tower. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment provides rooms with air conditioning, free private parking and free WiFi.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 13 km from Oporto Chic & Cozy - Anibal Cunha, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: RIBEIRA by YoursPorto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Offering a riverside location and a stylish décor with exposed stone walls, Douro Apartments – RiverTop features 1-bedroom apartments in Porto Ribeira district. Free WiFi is provided.

All units have a seating area with a sofa and a TV, and some have a balcony with river view. Bedrooms have a double bed and each one has its own décor.

The kitchenette opens to the seating area and has all the appliances to prepare meals. The riverside location of the apartments allows guests to easily explore the Porto wine caves, located across the river.

Palácio da Bolsa is 2 minute’s walking from the apartments, and the iconic Torre dos Clérigos is less than 10 minutes’ walking.

Douro Apartments – RiverTop  is 22 km from Porto International Airport.

name: Stay in Apartments Ribeira 24
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 21m²
description:
Stay in Apartments Ribeira 24 provides accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. Popular points of interest nearby include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Oporto Coliseum. The property offers soundproof units and is located 100 metres from Ribeira Square.

Overlooking the quiet street, units in this apartment are accessible via private entrance and fitted with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Sao Bento Metro Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Stay in Apartments Ribeira 24.

name: Stay in Apartments - S. Bento
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
Stay in Apartments - S. Bento is primely located in Porto’s centre and enjoys panoramic views over the historical São Bento Train Station, which is across the street. Aliados Avenue is 150 metres away.

The bright unit features a small meal area, which also comes with a microwave and a toaster. The unit has a private bathroom and a double bed, which faces the scenic balcony, Free WiFi access is available, as well as a cable TV.

A wide range of local restaurants and cafés is available within a short 5-minute walk from the unit. The region’s rich gastronomy is highlighted by dishes such as Francesinha and Tripas à Moda do Porto, along with the region’s renowned quality wines.

The famed Clérigos Tower is 350 metres away and is one of the city’s most emblematic sights. Galerias de Paris, the city’s main bar area is just 500 metres from the property. Dom Luis I Bridge is 800 metres away and connects with Vila Nova de Gaia, site of the Port Wine Cellars. The Stay in Apartments - S. Bento is a 20-minute drive from Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport.

name: Alegria Suítes By Porto City Hosts
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Offering city views, Alegria Suítes By Porto City Hosts is an accommodation situated in Porto, 1.7 km from Oporto Coliseum and 2.1 km from FC Porto Museum. The property is set 2.3 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, 2.3 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 2.5 km from Campanha Train Station. Ferreira Borges Market is 3.5 km away and Ribeira Square is 3.7 km from the apartment.

All air-conditioned units include a fully equipped kitchen, allowing guests to prepare their own meals. With a private bathroom fitted with a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also feature free WiFi, while some rooms also boast a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units are allergy-free and soundproof.

Estadio do Dragao is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Clerigos Tower is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from Alegria Suítes By Porto City Hosts, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: YOUROPO - Flores
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 74m²
description:
Ideally located in Porto, YOUROPO - Flores is a sustainable apartment, which offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. The property has city and inner courtyard views, and is 200 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near YOUROPO - Flores include Sao Bento Train Station, Ribeira Square and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 17 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Palanca
description:
Featuring a garden and views of garden, Maison Cabral is a sustainable guest house located in Porto, 1.6 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 1.6 km from Sao Bento Train Station. The guest house provides an outdoor swimming pool with a pool bar, as well as wellness packages and luggage storage space.

All units feature air conditioning and a satellite flat-screen TV. All units come with a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace and some have pool views. At the guest house, all units have bed linen and towels.

A bar can be found on-site.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the guest house.

Popular points of interest near Maison Cabral include Oporto Coliseum, Music House and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description_short: Entire villa • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 100m²

Each unit has a terrace, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area and a seating area with a flat-screen TV, while the private bathroom includes a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the villa complex, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Palacio da Bolsa is 3.5 km from the villa, while Ferreira Borges Market is 3.6 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 12 km from Boavista Luxury Villas.

name: Serenata Boutique Rooms
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 41m²
description:
In the Paranhos district of Porto, close to FC Porto Museum, Feel Corporate Housing Marquês features a terrace and a washing machine. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation provides a lift and a concierge service for guests.

The units in the apartment complex are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a bidet and a shower. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with fruits and juice are available daily at the apartment.

Estadio do Dragao is 1.3 km from Feel Corporate Housing Marquês, while Oporto Coliseum is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: BO - Álvares Cabral GuestHouse
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 12m²
description:
Panorama Apartments Ribeira Porto is a house comprising 4 fully equipped holiday studio apartments situated in Ribeira, on the water front of the Douro River, and in the heart of Porto's Historic Centre.

All the apartments and the room have views over the river Douro, the world famous Don Luis Bridge and the Port Wine cellars across the river in Gaia.

Both D. Luis Bridge and Douro River are a 1-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 12 km away.

name: Casa Portugueza Experience
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Set in Porto and with Oporto Coliseum reachable within 1.2 km, Fontinha Square Apartments by Porto City Hosts offers express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. The property features inner courtyard views and is 1.4 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 1.3 km from Sao Bento Train Station. The apartment has family rooms.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning and features a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

Clerigos Tower is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Palacio da Bolsa is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Fontinha Square Apartments by Porto City Hosts, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Maison Cabral
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Rua das Flores Neighborhood features a balcony and is located in Porto, within just 200 metres of Sao Bento Train Station and 600 metres of Ribeira Square. Complimentary WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The property is 300 metres from the city centre and 100 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station.

The apartment includes 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a bidet, a seating area, and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Rua das Flores Neighborhood include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: YOUROPO - Cosy
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 75m²
description:
Surrounded by views of the quiet street, Live in Porto - 68 Regras is a sustainable apartment in Porto, offering guests an environmentally friendly accommodation close to Sao Bento Metro Station. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features city views, a sun terrace, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Live in Porto - 68 Regras, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Liiiving in Porto - City View Apartments
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Offering free WiFi and river views, Tripas-Coração, Cordoaria River View, Garden View or Loft is an accommodation set in the heart of Porto, just 300 metres from Clerigos Tower and 800 metres from Palacio da Bolsa. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a balcony or a patio. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ferreira Borges Market, Ribeira Square and Sao Bento Metro Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Tripas-Coração, Cordoaria River View, Garden View or Loft, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Boavista Luxury Villas
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 35m²
description:
São Bento Apartments is a self-catering accommodation located in the historical centre of Porto. Set in a 17th century building, this apartment offers free WiFi in all areas.

Guests can prepare their own light meals using the kitchenette. Alternatively guests can visit the traditional Porto restaurants in the UNESCO World Heritage Ribeira area 400 metres away. At night guests can visit the bars in the Galerias de Paris area an 8-minute walk away.

São Bento Apartments have a privileged location being within walking range of various points of interest and transportation. The São Bento Train Station and Metro Station are just 20 metres away and the famous Clérigos Tower and Lello & Irmão Bookstore are 400 metres away. Porto International Airport is 17 km away.

name: Porto Royal Bridges Hotel
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Bateira's Apartments offers accommodation within 100 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The air-conditioned accommodation is 300 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony with city views and an outdoor dining area. At the apartment complex, each unit includes a seating area.

Popular points of interest near Bateira's Apartments include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Fontinha Square Apartments by Porto City Hosts
description_short: Entire villa • 4 bedrooms • 1 living room • 3 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 400m²
description:
Surrounded by views of the inner courtyard, Casa Portugueza Experience is a sustainable apartment in Porto, offering guests an environmentally friendly accommodation close to FC Porto Museum. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers bike hire and features a garden and outdoor fireplace.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and garden views features 4 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 3 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and fruits. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

In the warmer months, you can make use of the barbecue facilities and dine on the private balcony.

For guests with children, the apartment provides a baby safety gate. A car rental service is available at Casa Portugueza Experience.

Estadio do Dragao is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Campanha Train Station is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Casa Portugueza Experience.

name: Feel Corporate Housing Marquês
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 25m²
description:
Flores 36 by Yoursporto Apartments are located in an historical building in central Porto. Free WiFi access is available. The property is 450 metres from Clérigos Tower and a 5-minute walk from São Bento Train Station.

Each apartment was completely renovated and is equipped with heating and soundproofing. Private bathrooms come with a bath or a shower. The apartments offer a mix of modern and old elements including simple furniture, exposed stone walls and wooden beams in the ceiling.

Guests can cook their own meals using the kitchen or the kitchenette provided in each accommodation. In addition guests can taste the local gastronomy at the restaurants within 200 metres. The Ribeira area, by the Douro River, a 5-minute walk, is filled with bars where guests can relax while enjoying a glass of wine.

Across the Douro River, through the D. Luis I Bridge, guests can visit the Port Wine Cellars and enjoy some wine-tasting sessions. Porto International Airport is 16 km away from FLORES 36 by YoursPorto.

name: Belomonte 103 by LovelyStay
description:
Located in Porto, less than 1 km from Oporto Coliseum, Vincci Bonjardim provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Vincci Bonjardim every room is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Vincci Bonjardim.

name: Live in Porto - 68 Regras
description:
Part of Mercado do Bom Sucesso building, the design Hotel da Música offers a 24-hour reception 400 metres from Casa da Música Metro Station. It features a restaurant and bar on site. Private outdoor parking is available on site, along with a charging station for electrical vehicles.

The bright rooms feature a clean design with parquet floors. There is a mini-bar and a flat-screen cable TV with pay-per-view channels. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe and free toiletries.

A breakfast buffet is served daily. Bom Sucesso Gourmet Restaurant offers an exclusive concept, allowing guests to pick the organic products at the market and have them cooked at the restaurant by a renowned chef.

There is a multifunction room which can host up to 100 people, with the latest equipment available. Room service is also available.

The kosher-certified property is a 10-minute walk from the Kadoorie Mekor Haim Synagogue. The nearby metro station offers easy access to most of Porto’s landmarks, including Clérigos Tower and Lello bookshop in a 20-minute metro ride. Porto International Airport is 13 km from Hotel da Música.

name: Panorama Apartments Ribeira Porto
description:
Boasting a bar, Porto Royal Bridges Hotel is set in the centre of Porto, 200 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Porto Royal Bridges Hotel the rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Porto Royal Bridges Hotel.

name: Hotel da Música
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Attractively set in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, Tripas-Coração, Breiner GreenHouse is a sustainable apartment situated 1.7 km from Palacio da Bolsa and 1.5 km from Music House. The property invites guests to reconnect with nature and encourages them to make eco-friendly travel choices. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The property is 1 km from Clerigos Tower, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

Featuring a well-fitted kitchen with an oven and a microwave, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also boast free WiFi. At the apartment complex, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

For guests with children, the apartment features a baby safety gate.

Popular points of interest near Tripas-Coração, Breiner GreenHouse include Ferreira Borges Market, Boavista Roundabout and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Dear Porto Guest House
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 42m²
description:
Offering free WiFi and inner courtyard views, Chillout Trindade Apartment is an accommodation situated right in the heart of Porto, just less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and a 11-minute walk from Sao Bento Train Station. Guests can benefit from a balcony and a picnic area. Outdoor dining is also possible at the apartment.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and chocolates or cookies. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

There is a garden with a barbecue at this property and guests can go cycling and hiking nearby.

Popular points of interest near Chillout Trindade Apartment include Oporto Coliseum, Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Tripas-Coração, Cordoaria River View, Garden View or Loft
description:
This hotel offers free parking just 1 km from the centre of Porto, and is a 5-minute walk away from the Marques Metro Station. The rooms are air-conditioned and there is a 24-hour reception service.

All elevator-accessible and simply furnished rooms at Hotel Palanca come equipped with cable TV. Each room has a private bathroom with a bathtub or shower.

A continental breakfast is available in Palanca’s breakfast room or through room service. There is also a living room with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV, and a spacious bar for drinks.

The Palanca is located around the corner from the Quinta do Covelo Park, and a 15-minute walk from the Fernando Pessoa University. Car rentals can be arranged at the reception.

name: BREINER 54
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen
description:
Located 1.3 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 1.2 km from Sao Bento Train Station, Liiiving in Porto - City View Apartments in Porto provides air-conditioned accommodation with views of the city and free WiFi. Featuring a terrace, the apartment is close to several noted attractions, around 1.3 km from Oporto Coliseum, 1.7 km from Music House and less than 1 km from Clerigos Tower. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with a dining table, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boavista Roundabout, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from Liiiving in Porto - City View Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: FLORES 36 by YoursPorto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 57m²
description:
Belomonte 103 by LovelyStay features accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, an oven and a toaster. The property is situated 700 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station, 800 metres from Sao Bento Train Station and 600 metres from Clerigos Tower. Oporto Coliseum is 1.3 km away and Music House is 3.7 km from the apartment.

The apartment offers a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and shower. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Belomonte 103 by LovelyStay.

name: Rua das Flores Neighborhood
description:
