The units in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a kettle. With a shared bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also offer free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Music House, Ferreira Borges Market and Boavista Roundabout. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from BREINER 54.

name: Bateira's Apartments
description:
Offering air-conditioned rooms in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, BO - Álvares Cabral GuestHouse is 1.4 km from City Market Bolhao. 1.8 km from Soares dos Reis National Museum and 2.3 km from Paris Galleries Street, the property offers a garden and a terrace. The property is 2.4 km from Boavista Roundabout and Clerigos Tower.

All rooms in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Bom Sucesso Market is 2.6 km from BO - Álvares Cabral GuestHouse. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Vincci Bonjardim
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Located in the centre of Porto, YOUROPO - Cosy is a sustainable accommodation, which provides soundproof rooms. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

The units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surroundings.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Oporto Coliseum, Sao Bento Metro Station and Sao Bento Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from YOUROPO - Cosy.

name: Chillout Trindade Apartment
description:
Located in Porto’s historical centre, Dear Porto Guest House is just 500 metres from São Bento Train Station. It offers rooms with free WiFi and city views.

Dear Porto has rooms with wooden floors and flat-screen TVs, private bathroom with amenities and daily cleaning. There is also a patio where guests can relax.

Guests can benefit from the hotel’s ironing and fax services.

Dear Porto Guest House is 350 meters from the Bolhão Metro Station. The Coliseu do Porto is only a 9-minute walk away. Other nearby attractions include Café Magestic, Bolhão Market and the famous Port Wine Cellars.

name: GuestReady - Belle Époque-Apartments
description:
Located in Porto, 1.6 km from Music House and 1.3 km from Boavista Roundabout, Serenata Boutique Rooms offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property is around 2.5 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, 2.6 km from Sao Bento Train Station and 3 km from Oporto Coliseum. Ferreira Borges Market is 3.8 km away and Ribeira Square is 4 km from the bed and breakfast.

The units at the bed and breakfast are equipped with a private bathroom and bed linen.

Clerigos Tower is 3.3 km from the bed and breakfast, while Palacio da Bolsa is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 13 km from Serenata Boutique Rooms.

name: DA'HOME - Cedofeita Art Studio
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
In the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, close to Palacio da Bolsa, DA'HOME - Cedofeita Art Studio has free WiFi and a washing machine. This sustainable apartment is located 1.1 km from Ferreira Borges Market and 1.3 km from Ribeira Square. The property is 600 metres from Clerigos Tower, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

The 1-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is available for the continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Music House, Boavista Roundabout and Sao Bento Metro Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from DA'HOME - Cedofeita Art Studio, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Monte Carlo Love Porto
description:
Monte Carlo Love Porto, a property with a garden, is located in Porto, 1.5 km from Campanha Train Station, 1.6 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, as well as 1.5 km from Sao Bento Train Station. The property features garden and city views, and is less than 1 km from Oporto Coliseum. The guest house provides a sun terrace and a 24-hour front desk.

All units feature air conditioning and a cable flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the guest house also offer free WiFi, while certain rooms include a balcony. At the guest house, every unit has bed linen and towels.

The guest house has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include FC Porto Museum, Clerigos Tower and D. Luis I Bridge. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Monte Carlo Love Porto.

name: M Maison Particulière Porto
description_short: Private suite
description:
Located in a 16th-century building in Porto old town, a UNESCO heritage site, the M Maison Particulière Porto offers the classic feel of a Paris hotel. A library and free WiFi are available.

Rooms are individually decorated with a timeless décor of unique furnishings, high ceilings, stucco details, and wall paintings.

Guests are served breakfast in the morning, and a 5-minute walk takes them to restaurants serving authentic local flavours.

The iconic D. Luís Bridge is 550 metres and the superior deck can be crossed on foot or by metro. Porto Cathedral is 400 metres and the Ribeira area is 400 metres from M Maison Particulière Porto.

Porto International Airport is 22 km away.

name: OHH - Porto Boutique Guest House
description:
In the Paranhos district of Porto, close to FC Porto Museum, OHH - Porto Boutique Guest House features a garden and a washing machine. This guest house features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi. The guest house has family rooms.

At the guest house, each unit is fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A fridge and minibar are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. In some units there is a dressing room for guests to change in.

Estadio do Dragao is 1.6 km from the guest house, while Campanha Train Station is 3.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from OHH - Porto Boutique Guest House, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Porto Formosa Central Lofts
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
Conveniently set in Porto, Porto Formosa Central Lofts provides a continental breakfast and free WiFi. This sustainable apartment is located 500 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 1.1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station. The property is close to popular attractions like Palacio da Bolsa, Ferreira Borges Market and Ribeira Square.

All of the air-conditioned units feature a private bathroom, flat-screen TV and fully equipped kitchen.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Campanha Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 18 km from Porto Formosa Central Lofts, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Loft Martires da Liberdade by Porto City Hosts
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 56m²
description:
Located in the centre of Porto, less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from Sao Bento Train Station, Loft Martires da Liberdade by Porto City Hosts offers free WiFi and air conditioning. This sustainable apartment is located 1.2 km from Oporto Coliseum and 2 km from Music House. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Clerigos Tower.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boavista Roundabout, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from Loft Martires da Liberdade by Porto City Hosts, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: PortoHouse
description_short: Entire holiday home • 5 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 600m²
description:
Situated in Porto, PortoHouse features accommodation with a private pool, a balcony and pool views. With garden views, this accommodation provides a patio. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi, free private parking and an electric vehicle charging station.

Boasting a Nintendo Wii, the spacious holiday home has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 5 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a bidet. The allergy-free unit is comprised of a fireplace, bath and flat-screen TV with game console. The property has an outdoor dining area.

You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at the holiday home, and bike hire is available. Guests can swim in the indoor pool, go hiking or walking tours, or relax in the garden and use the barbecue facilities.

FC Porto Museum is 2.5 km from PortoHouse, while Campanha Train Station is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 18 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Olive Nature – Tourism Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 40m²
description:
Located in the centre of Porto, 300 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and 200 metres from Sao Bento Train Station, Olive Nature – Tourism Apartments offers free WiFi and air conditioning. This sustainable aparthotel is located 300 metres from Oporto Coliseum and 600 metres from Clerigos Tower. The property offers soundproof units and is set 1.1 km from Palacio da Bolsa.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a kettle. At the aparthotel, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the aparthotel.

Popular points of interest near Olive Nature – Tourism Apartments include Ferreira Borges Market, Ribeira Square and D. Luis I Bridge. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: SUPERNOVA - Hostel & Café
description_short: Bed in dormitory
description:
Located in Porto historic centre, the SUPERNOVA - Hostel & Café hostel is a 1-minute walk from the central Trindade Metro Station. This renovated and charming hostel has a 24-hour front desk, a bar, as well as high-speed free WiFi access.

The modern rooms at SUPERNOVA - Hostel & Café have either a private bathroom or access to shared bathroom facilities. Some have balconies. They also feature wooden floors and individual reading lights. Dormitories feature bunk beds, wooden floors and access to shared bathroom facilities.

Guests can find restaurants and bars within 100 metres. The famed Santa Catarina shopping street is at a 5-minute walk and has an assortment of eateries.

The Clérigos Tower is a 10-minute walk, as is the Galerias de Paris nightlife spot. Staff at the reception can arrange an airport shuttle to Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport, 16 km away.

name: Apartamentos Portodouro - Santa Catarina
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Located in Porto's city centre, these apartments feature balconies and panoramic city views. The units are sited in Santa Catarina Street, one of Porto’s busiest commercial areas.

Apartamentos Portodouro - Santa Catarina’s refurbished units all come with air conditioning and free WiFi access. The apartments have a dining area in the living room, which also comes with sofas and a TV.

There is an equipped kitchenette, which guests may use in order to cook their own meals. Santa Catarina Street has plenty of restaurants, pastry shops and historical cafés.

Central Aliados Avenue and Porto City Hall are within 600 metres. The iconic Clérigos Tower is 1.3 km away, as are the Galerias de Paris. The central Trindade Metro Station is 450 metres from the apartments. Porto’s International Airport is 16.4 km from the Apartamentos Portodouro - Santa Catarina.

name: Santa Catarina Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 75m²
description:

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchenette, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 18 km from Santa Catarina Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Locally Yours Flores Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Locally Yours Flores Apartments features accommodation within 300 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. This recently renovated apartment is located 100 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and 200 metres from Sao Bento Train Station. Featuring a private entrance, the apartment allows guests to maintain their privacy.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a stovetop, a coffee machine, a a bath or shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Units have a kettle and a private bathroom, while some rooms also boast a balcony. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ribeira Square, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from Locally Yours Flores Apartments.

name: Aspasios Almada Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 83m²
description:
Aspasios Almada Apartments features accommodation within 200 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This sustainable apartment is located 300 metres from Sao Bento Metro Station and 200 metres from Sao Bento Train Station. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

All units are fitted with a toaster, fridge, a coffee machine, a stovetop and kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, all units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms include a terrace. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Aspasios Almada Apartments include Clerigos Tower, Oporto Coliseum and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: VB Porto City Studio, by Flat in Porto
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 31m²
description:
Surrounded by views of the city, VB Porto City Studio, by Flat in Porto is a sustainable apartment in Porto, offering guests an environmentally friendly accommodation close to Sao Bento Metro Station. Complimentary WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 500 metres from Oporto Coliseum.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Train Station, Campanha Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from VB Porto City Studio, by Flat in Porto, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Apartment by Best2Stay III
description:
Apartment by Best2Stay III features a balcony and is located in Porto, within just 1.1 km of Sao Bento Train Station and 1.2 km of Oporto Coliseum. It is situated 1.3 km from Clerigos Tower and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sao Bento Metro Station is 1.2 km away.

Located on the ground floor, this apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a well-equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, a living room, and a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment can enjoy a continental breakfast. Dining options are available close to Apartment by Best2Stay III.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Music House, Boavista Roundabout and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from Apartment by Best2Stay III.

name: NH Collection Porto Batalha
description:
The sophisticated NH Collection Porto Batalha is a 4-star hotel that offers its guests access to an indoor pool and is situated in the very centre of the unique city of Porto. Featuring free WiFi in all areas, this hotel is just a 4-minute walk from the São Bento station.

Facing the S. João National Theatre and the cosmopolitan Batalha Square, the NH Collection Porto's elegant rooms come with double or twin beds and private bathrooms with bath or shower, bidet, hairdryer and free toiletries. Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a seating area, a safety deposit box, a minibar, a coffee machine and an electric kettle.

The NH Collection provides its guests a reinvigorating breakfast buffet each morning and serves meals at the on-site restaurant. In the evening guests can enjoy a beverage at the hotel’s bar. The centre of all nightlife is just 700 metres away at the Galerias de Paris.

With a 24-hour front desk the NH Collection Porto Batalha includes exclusive facilities like sauna, fitness centre and a relaxing indoor pool. Guests can request massages, laundry and dry cleaning services.

The World Heritage Ribeira area, 1 km away, offers a great variety of restaurants and snack bars where guests can enjoy the most traditional Porto dishes and tapas while gazing at the Douro River and the D. Luis I Bridge. Across the Douro, guests can visit the Port Wine cellars and enjoy a panoramic view of the city. Porto International Airport is 17 km away.

name: Porto Deluxe Suites
description:
Set in Porto, 400 metres from Boavista Roundabout and 200 metres from Music House, Porto Deluxe Suites offers accommodation with air conditioning and access to a garden. The property features garden and city views, and is 2.6 km from Clerigos Tower. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace.

The units at the guest house come with a seating area. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the guest house also have free WiFi, while selected rooms here will provide you with a balcony. At the guest house, the units come with bed linen and towels.

A bicycle rental service is available at the guest house.

Palacio da Bolsa is 3 km from Porto Deluxe Suites, while Ferreira Borges Market is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Porto City Hotel
description:
Featuring 3-star accommodation, Porto City Hotel is situated in Porto, 1.8 km from Sao Bento Metro Station and 1.7 km from Sao Bento Train Station. The property is set 1.8 km from Oporto Coliseum, 2.7 km from Music House and 2.8 km from Boavista Roundabout. The hotel also features free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Porto City Hotel the rooms have bed linen and towels.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception.

Clerigos Tower is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Palacio da Bolsa is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from Porto City Hotel.

name: Citybreak-apartments Douro View
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 110m²
description:
Located in the historical centre of Porto, Citybreak-apartments Douro View are self-catering apartments that have been recently renovated and offer views of the Douro River and free WiFi in all areas.

These luxury apartments include 2 bedrooms each and a living room with sofas and a flat-screen cable TV. Each apartment has a bathroom with shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

At Citybreak-apartments Douro View guests can prepare their own meals using the fully equipped kitchen. In addition guests can visit the restaurants located within 200 metres and taste the local cuisine. At night guests can visit the Ribeira area or the Galerias de Paris, both within a 10-minute walk.

The staff at Citybreak-apartments Douro View can help guests with airport shuttle service, bicycle rental or simply recommendations of what to visit and where to eat. The central location of these apartments allows guests to easily visit some of the most interesting parts of Porto.

Clérigos Tower is 450 metres away and the famous Lello Bookstore is an 8-minute walk. The São Bento Train and Metro Station is 850 metres away and Porto International Airport is a 19-minute drive.

name: Liiiving in Porto - Ribeira Vintage View
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 3 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 140m²
description:
Situated in Porto, 300 metres from Palacio da Bolsa and 300 metres from Ferreira Borges Market, Liiiving in Porto - Ribeira Vintage View features spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. It is located 500 metres from Ribeira Square and provides a lift. The property is 800 metres from the city centre and 500 metres from Clerigos Tower.

The 3-bedroom apartment features a living room with a TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 3 bathrooms with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from Liiiving in Porto - Ribeira Vintage View.

name: BmyGuest - The Marquis Luxury Garden Apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 170m²
description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a patio, BmyGuest - The Marquis Luxury Garden Apartment is located in Porto. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.8 km from Oporto Coliseum.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

The apartment has a garden and sun terrace, which can be enjoyed by guests if the weather permits.

FC Porto Museum is 2.2 km from BmyGuest - The Marquis Luxury Garden Apartment, while Sao Bento Metro Station is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: The Passenger Hostel
description:
The Passenger Hostel is located in the iconic S. Bento Train Station, within the UNESCO World Heritage area of Porto. It offers private and shared accommodation, a bar and free WiFi access.

Dorm rooms feature a private locker for each guest, a curtain for more privacy, a bedside power socket and an individual light. All rooms have access to shared bathrooms with a shower and a hairdryer.

All guests can use the shared kitchen, and the area is filled with dining options. There is a washing machine and tumble dryer for guests’ use.

Douro riverside is a 15-minute walk from The Passenger, and Galerias de Paris street is 400 metres. Santa Catarina shopping street is less than 5 minutes’ walking.

Porto International Airport is around 16 km away, and S. Bento Metro Station is at the doorstep.

name: Residência Céu Azul
description:
In a prime location in the União de Freguesias do Centro district of Porto, Residência Céu Azul is set 1.4 km from Oporto Coliseum, 1.4 km from Clerigos Tower and 1.9 km from Music House. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 1.3 km from Sao Bento Train Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sao Bento Metro Station is 1.4 km away.

Additional in-room amenities include chocolates or cookies. The units at the guest house come with a TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box.

Boavista Roundabout is 1.7 km from the guest house, while Palacio da Bolsa is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from Residência Céu Azul, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Situated in Porto, 190 metres from Faria Guimarães Metro Station, Camões 691 Design Apartments by Porto City Hosts provides accommodation with seating area and free WiFi access. Clérigos Tower is a 15-minute walk from the property.

Each of the units consists of a living room with a flat-screen TV, a well-equipped kitchen, and a private bathroom with shower. An oven and microwave are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A washing machine is at guests' disposal in each apartment.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the apartment. Restaurants and cafés can also be found in the surroundings.

City Market Bolhao is 1.4 km from Camões 691 Design Apartments by Porto City Hosts, while Oporto Coliseum is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the property.

name: OportoLuxApartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
OportoLuxApartments provides accommodation within 500 metres of the centre of Porto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a fridge. The property is close to Clerigos Tower, Boavista Roundabout and Palacio da Bolsa. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

All units include a private bathroom and have air conditioning, a TV and a stovetop. The units will provide guests with kitchenware.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from OportoLuxApartments.

Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 400 metres from Ribeira Square, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a shower. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and chocolates or cookies. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 17 km from Charming Studio in Historic Downtown, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Casa do Bairro 2
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen
description:
Located in the centre of Porto, just 600 metres from Oporto Coliseum and less than 1 km from Sao Bento Metro Station, Casa do Bairro 2 provides accommodation with quiet street views and free WiFi. The property is close to Ferreira Borges Market, Clerigos Tower and D. Luis I Bridge. The property is allergy-free and is situated 800 metres from Sao Bento Train Station.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Campanha Train Station, Ribeira Square and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 18 km from Casa do Bairro 2.

name: Jardim da Batalha Boutique Hotel by Shiadu
description:
In a prime location in the centre of Porto, Jardim da Batalha Boutique Hotel by Shiadu offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a shared lounge. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

name: My Ribeira Guest House
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 100m²

Each apartment includes a living room with a sofa and a cable TV. The elegant bedrooms feature cushioned headboards, and all apartments offer free WiFi access. The bathroom comes with free Yves Rocher toiletries and a hairdryer.

The kitchenette is fully equipped with all the utensils to prepare meals, and guests will find complimentary fruit, coffee and tea. Every morning and for an additional cost, Casas do Porto - Ribeira Apartments can deliver a breakfast basket with bread, croissants, milk, juice, yogurt, cereals, cheese and ham.

The Palácio da Bolsa (Stock Exchange Palace) is within 100 metres from Casas do Porto - Ribeira Apartments, featuring a 19th-century neoclassic architecture. The lively summer terraces of the Ribeira area are less than 500 metres, offering views of the Porto wine cellars across the river.

Porto International Airport is located 12 km away from Casas do Porto - Ribeira Apartments, and the well-known Torre dos Clérigos is within a 5-minute walk, as well as Galerias Paris entertainment district.

name: Casas do Porto - Ribeira Apartments

Continental breakfast includes freshly baked bread rolls. Guests at Hotel S.Marino can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar or out in the small garden. There is also a common living room with a TV.

Tours and rental cars can be arranged with the help of S.Marino’s staff, available 24 hours a day. The hotel is located 1 km from the Ribeira and the famous port cellars.

A number of restaurants serving a range of local and international cuisine can be found within 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments. There are also a variety of bars within a similar distance from the apartments.

Attractions in the area include the port wine district, such as the Sandeman port winery located less than 1.5 km away. The Paço Episcopal (Episcopal Palace) and Clérigos Tower are less than 400 metres away.

The Porto International Airport is 12 km away from Citybreak-apartments Patio, and a shuttle service is available on request.

description:
Located on the Avenida da Boavista, in the heart of the city’s business and cultural district, the modern Crowne Plaza Porto exudes pure luxury and comfort. This 5-star hotel is situated 900 metres from Casa da Música.

Only a few kilometres from Porto’s beautiful beaches, Crowne Plaza Porto (formerly Tiara Park Atlantic Porto) is the perfect choice. Enjoy magnificent views from the comfort of your spacious room or venture out into the city. All public and privates spaces are elegantly furnished, radiating a warm and cosy atmosphere.

The helpful reception staff is at your service 24 hours a day and will do its best to ensure you have a relaxing and memorable stay. Sample delicious local specialities at the restaurant or take a walk in the hotel garden. For business travellers looking to combine work with pleasure, on-site meeting facilities are available. Free access to digital newspapers is provided to guests.

Crowne Plaza Porto is situated just 700 metres from the Botanic Gardens of Porto and 2 km from the lush Serralves Gardens and Museum. The Bessa Football Stadium is just 250 metres away the Porto International Airport is 11 km away.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ferreira Borges Market, Boavista Roundabout and Ribeira Square. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from TMH Torrinha.

description:
Centrally located on Batalha Square, Legendary Porto Hotel is a 5-minute walk from São Bento Metro Station. The recently-renovated property features a bar and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV.

The soundproofed rooms at Legendary Porto Hotel have new furnishings and blackout curtains. Each comes equipped with tea and coffee-making facilities and include a seating area with sofa and a flat-screen TV. En suite bathrooms come with hairdryer.

The Legendary's breakfast area was also subject of a full renovation, including brand new buffet equipment where the daily continental breakfast is served. Gluten and lactose free options are available for breakfast upon previous request. Guests are welcome to discover the wide range of popular restaurants and eateries in the surrounding area, many of which serving traditional Porto delicacies.

The property's lifts were subject of a full renovation and are now silent and ecological. Guests can relax in the contemporary lounge with flat-screen TVs. An attentive staff can help with car rental and laundry facilities and is available 24/7. The hotel also features a small fitness centre, which is available to guests 24/7.

A 30 minute-drive from Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, Legendary Porto Hotel is also a 7-minute walk from Bolhão Metro Station. The renowned Porto Wine Cellars are less than 3 km away, and the promenade on the Douro River with the iconic D. Luís Bridge is 300 metres away.

description:

This guest house offers accommodation in private rooms and one-bedroom apartments. All units have an elegant décor with sober shades. Bathrooms are modern and include a walk-in shower.

Some apartments include a kitchenette, and some rooms have a mini-bar. All units have tea/coffee making facilities and a flat-screen cable TV.

Guests are less than 10 minutes’ walking from Bom Sucesso shopping centre, where a variety of shops and dining options are available. Bom Sucesso market, located across the street from the shopping centre, also has gourmet dining options for lunch and dinner.

Koolhouse Porto is 2.3 km from Serralves Garden and Park. A pleasant 20-minute walk takes guests to Cristal Palace Gardens, and 10 minutes’ walking further guests will find Clérigos Tower.

Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is within a 15-minute drive from the Koolhouse, and the A1 motorway is less than 2 km away.

name: Poveira Hotel
description:
Set 50 metres from the Campanhã Train and Metro Station, Poveira Hotel is a family-run guest house in Porto. Situated in a historic building, it offers a well-stocked bar and a coffee shop.

The simply furnished air-conditioned rooms are fitted with double-glazed windows and a work desk. Each has cable TV and a telephone. Some rooms include balconies.

Poveira Hotel is just a short train or metro ride from the centre of Porto and the Douro waterfront. The beach can be reached within 15 minutes. Underground parking is available 50 metres from the property.

name: The Convo Porto Hotel & Apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 44m²
description:
Situated in Porto and with Oporto Coliseum reachable within 1.7 km, The Convo Porto Hotel & Apartment features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. Attractively located in the Bonfim district, this hotel provides a bar. Some rooms at the property have a balcony with a city view.

All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Rooms are equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms include a kitchen fitted with a fridge. At The Convo Porto Hotel & Apartment the rooms come with bed linen and towels.

FC Porto Museum is 2.1 km from the accommodation, while Sao Bento Metro Station is 2.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 14 km from The Convo Porto Hotel & Apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

The property features city views and is 300 metres from Ribeira Square and 300 metres from Palacio da Bolsa. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

At the apartment complex, the units come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units come with air conditioning, and certain units at the apartment complex have a terrace. The units will provide guests with a fridge.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ferreira Borges Market, Sao Bento Metro Station and Sao Bento Train Station. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 16 km from CLUBE Charming Apartments - Ribeira, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:

Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 500 metres from Oporto Coliseum, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

At the apartment complex, units include air conditioning, a seating area, a TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a bidet and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance of the property. A car rental service is available at YOUROPO - Capela.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from YOUROPO - Capela, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sao Bento Metro Station is 1.9 km away.

The holiday home features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a patio with city views. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like cycling.

name: Hotel do Norte
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 50m²
description:
One of the oldest hotels in Porto, Hotel do Norte features free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. Located 150 metres from Bolhao Metro Station in the city centre, it offers air-conditioned renovated rooms with stylish furnishings and modern bathrooms.

Some of the bright rooms have a private terrace with a view of Capela das Almas Church, with its ornate blue and white façade.

Guests can have a taste of traditional Portuguese cuisine or enjoy some beverages at the bars and restaurants within a 15-minute walk.

Hotel do Norte is both less than a 5-minute walk from Oporto Coliseum and Bolhao City Market. The Metro offers easy access to the rest of the city. Bicycle rental is available and the property can arrange car hire.

Porto São Bento Train Station is 10 minutes’ walk and the city’s Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport is 13 km away. The Guindais Funicular is located at a 10-minute walk and it can take guests to visit the Ribeira area by the Douro River.

Popular points of interest near Luminous Mezzanine include Sao Bento Train Station, Clerigos Tower and D. Luis I Bridge. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 42m²
description:

The air-conditioned apartments include wooden floors, exposed stone walls and some even feature exposed wooden beams on the ceiling. Each unit offers design furniture, a flat-screen satellite TV, soundproofing and a private bathroom with bath or shower as well as free toiletries.

The apartments at Porto River come with fully equipped kitchenettes allowing guests to prepare their own meals. Alternatively, guests are welcome to visit the great variety of restaurants serving traditional Porto cuisine. In the evening there are plenty of bars in the vicinity where guests can relax and enjoy the unique view.

Due to its prime location, guests staying at Porto River aparthotel can easily visit most major landmarks in the centre of Porto. The iconic Clérigos Tower and the Lello Bookstore are 850 metres away while the Sé Cathedral is just a 10-minute walk away. The Aliados Avenue and the picturesque São Bento Train Station are a 13-minute walk away. Porto International Airport is 14 km away.

name: Top Flat
description:
Set in Miragaia, one of Porto’s historical neighbourhoods, this property overlooks the Douro River and is a 2-minute walk from the Alfândega do Porto. It is a 3-minute drive from the Vila Nova de Gaia riverside area.

All the air-conditioned studios and apartments feature a private bathroom with a hairdryer, free WiFi, flat-screen satellite TV, sofas and views over the city and the Douro River. Some have an equipped kitchenette.

Guests can prepare their own meals comfortably in the self-catering apartments and studios. Alternatively, the Ribeira area, overlooking the Douro River, is a 5-minute walk and features a variety of local restaurants serving typical Portuguese meals and tapas.

Galerias Paris, Porto’s main nightlife hotspot is a 9-minute walk away. This area overlooks the iconic Clérigos Tower and is a few steps from the historical Lello Bookstore. The TOP FLAT is a 7-minute drive from the Aliados in the Porto city centre. The Porto Wine Cellars are set on the Gaia riverside and there guests can taste quality Port wines and stroll along the scenic boardwalk area. The famed São Bento Train Station has historically-themed tiled panels and is a 5-minute walk away.

The Porto International Airport is a 17-minute drive from the TOP FLAT. An airport shuttle is available, at a surcharge.

Please note that a free mid-stay cleaning including change of bath towels will only be applied for stays over 3 nights.
Stays of 7 nights or more will also profit from linen change.

The uniquely decorated apartments and studios feature exposed stone walls and plenty of natural light. Each is heated and has a living area with sofa, Smart TV and a double bed. The apartments and studios come with a fully equipped kitchenette, including an espresso coffee machine.

Guests may choose to stay in and cook their own meals in the kitchenette, enjoying them in the dining area. Alternatively, the surrounding area is filled with traditional Porto restaurants, many within a short 3-minute walk. Aliados Avenue is a 6-minute walk and also has various eatery options.

At just 100 metres from the Largo São Domingos by Innapartments is the Bolsa Palace, which boasts a neoclassical 19th century architecture. The iconic Dom Luis I Bridge is 600 metres away and connects with Vila Nova de Gaia, site of the Port Wine Cellars. The Clérigos Tower and the lively bars of Galerias de Paris are at a 5-minute walk. The lively and popular Galerias de Paris, known for its nightlife, is 50 meters from the unit and features a wide range of restaurants, cafes, shops and bars.

The famous Lello Bookstore is 100 meters from the guest house. The center of Porto is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and features several notable landmarks, such as the Carmo Church 300 meters away, the São Bento Train Station 400 meters away and the Porto Cathedral 650 meters away.

Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is 17 km from Clérigos Ville Porto Rooms and is accessible via metro, which stops 400 meters away.

Please note that the accommodation is located in the city center and there may be external noise as it is located in one of the most characteristic streets of the city and close to the main activities and tourist attractions.

All rooms are equipped with fan coil units, which allow them to heated or cooled. Each features a flat-screen cable TV, minibar and work desk. Free WiFi is provided.

Local restaurants are available at a 5-minute walk. The traditional Porto cuisine is rich and varied, with signature dishes like the famed Francesinha and Tripas à Moda do Porto.

The Douro riverside area is a 14-minute walk from the unit. At 2.3 km is the historical Ribeira, with its various riverfront cafés, bars and restaurants. Within a 12-minute walk are the Clérigos Church and the Galerias de Paris nightlife spot, with trendy bars and cafés. Porto International Airport is 14.8 km away from the Oporto Loft.

description:
In the heart of Porto, set within a short distance of Ribeira Square and Clerigos Tower, Apartment by Best2Stay offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as an oven and coffee machine. This recently renovated apartment is located 700 metres from Palacio da Bolsa and 800 metres from Ferreira Borges Market. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Sao Bento Metro Station.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a terrace with quiet street views.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Apartment by Best2Stay include Sao Bento Train Station, Oporto Coliseum and D. Luis I Bridge. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boavista Roundabout, Oporto Coliseum and Clerigos Tower. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 14 km from Urban House by LovelyStay.

name: Catarina's Little Corner by LovelyStay
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 48m²
description:

The property is around 2.9 km from Campanha Train Station, 3 km from Estadio do Dragao and 3.2 km from Boavista Roundabout. name: Linha 22
description:
Located in the center of Porto, Linha 22 is a modest and authentic Guest House with a traditional structure belonging to the city's Historical Heritage. With a great location, it is a 3-minute walk from the city's main train and metro station: São Bento.

It has a coffe and wine shop from small Portuguese producers. Small and cozy, it was made with all dedication for the best comfort of its guests. Linha 22 is ideal for a weekend or for short stays in the beautiful city of Porto.

The classically-decorated rooms feature a private bathroom with free toiletries and some units also feature scenic views over the historical Porto center.

A Continental breakfast is served each morning at the guest house, for an extra fee.  With a scenic riverfront area full of restaurants serving traditional Porto dishes and tapas, the Ribeira neighborhood is just a 10-minute walk from our proprety

Linha 22 offers renowned Portuguese delicacies and a wide selection of wines and cheeses. In addition, our guests has 10% discount in any bottle of wine in the shop and there is a Happy Hour every day with delicious Port wines.

The central Aliados Avenue is a 5-minute walk and features shops, characteristic coffe shops and traditional restaurants. The property is a 3-minute walk from the classic Lello Bookstore, a popular Porto landmark. The iconic Dom Luis I Bridge is a 15-minute walk.

The Porto International Airport is a 19-minute drive from the Linha 22 or 30-minute by metro.

This is our guests' favorite part of Porto, according to independent reviews.

Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.7 for a two-person trip.

We do not recommend Line 22 for people with mobility problems since the property is a historical building heritage without elevators.
